trans-unit.target: 所述 innerWidth 属性在如下所示的窗口，框架，框架集，或一个次级窗口中的任何窗口对象支持。

trans-unit.source: The inputType read-only property of the InputEvent interface returns the type of change for editible content such as, for example, inserting, deleting, or formatting text.
trans-unit.target: InputEvent 接口的 inputType 只读属性返回可编辑内容的更改类型，例如，插入，删除或格式化文本。

trans-unit.source: The insertAdjacentElement() method inserts a given element node at a given position relative to the element it is invoked upon.
trans-unit.target: 所述 insertAdjacentElement() 方法插入在相对于它在调用的元件的给定位置的给定元素节点。

trans-unit.source: The insertAdjacentHTML() method parses the specified text as HTML or XML and inserts the resulting nodes into the DOM tree at a specified position. It does not reparse the element it is being used on, and thus it does not corrupt the existing elements inside that element. This avoids the extra step of serialization, making it much faster than direct innerHTML manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 所述 insertAdjacentHTML() 方法解析的指定位置的指定文本为HTML或XML和插入得到的节点到DOM树。它不会重新解析正在使用该元素的元素，因此不会破坏该元素内部的现有元素。这避免了额外的序列化步骤，使其比直接的 innerHTML 操作快得多。

trans-unit.source: The insertAdjacentText() method inserts a given text node at a given position relative to the element it is invoked upon.
trans-unit.target: 所述 insertAdjacentText() 方法插入在相对于它在调用的元件的给定位置的给定文本节点。

trans-unit.source: The install events in service workers use waitUntil() to hold the service worker in the installing phase until tasks complete. If the promise passed to waitUntil() rejects, the install is considered a failure, and the installing service worker is discarded. This is primarily used to ensure that a service worker is not considered installed until all of the core caches it depends on are successfully populated.
trans-unit.target: service workers 的 install 事件使用 waitUntil() 将服务工作者保持在 installing 阶段，直到任务完成。如果传递给 waitUntil() 的承诺被拒绝，则安装被视为失败，并且安装服务工作程序将被丢弃。这主要用于确保在成功填充其依赖的所有核心缓存之前，不要将服务工作器视为已安装。

trans-unit.source: The installing property of the ServiceWorkerRegistration interface returns a service worker whose ServiceWorker.state is installing. This property is initially set to null.
trans-unit.target: 在 installing 了的财产 ServiceWorkerRegistration 接口返回一个服务人员，其 ServiceWorker.state 被 installing 。此属性最初设置为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The instrumentKey read-only property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface returns a PaymentInstrument object reflecting the payment instrument selected by the user or an empty string if the user has not registered or chosen a payment instrument.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 instrumentKey 只读属性返回一个 PaymentInstrument 对象，该对象反映用户选择的支付工具，或者如果用户尚未注册或选择支付工具，则返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The integrity read-only property of the Request interface contains the subresource integrity value of the request.
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 integrity 只读属性包含请求的子资源完整性值。

trans-unit.source: The interimResults property of the SpeechRecognition interface controls whether interim results should be returned (true) or not (false.) Interim results are results that are not yet final (e.g. the SpeechRecognitionResult.isFinal property is false.)
trans-unit.target: 该 interimResults 的财产 SpeechRecognition 中期业绩是否应该返回界面控件（ true ）否（ false ）中期业绩结果尚未最后确定（例如 SpeechRecognitionResult.isFinal 属性是 false 。）

trans-unit.source: The internalformat parameter now accepts ext.RGBA16F_EXT and ext.RGBA16F_EXT.
trans-unit.target: 该 internalformat 参数现在接受 ext.RGBA16F_EXT 和 ext.RGBA16F_EXT 。

trans-unit.source: The internalformat parameter now accepts ext.RGBA32F_EXT and ext.RGB32F_EXT ().
trans-unit.target: 该 internalformat 参数现在接受 ext.RGBA32F_EXT 和 ext.RGB32F_EXT （）。

trans-unit.source: The invalid event is fired when a submittable element has been checked and doesn't satisfy its constraints. The validity of submittable elements is checked before submitting their owner form, or after the checkValidity() of the element or its owner form is called.
trans-unit.target: 该 invalid 时submittable元素了检验，并不能满足它的约束事件。在提交其所有者表单之前，或者在 checkValidity() 元素或其所有者表单的checkValidity（）之后，检查可提交元素的有效性。

trans-unit.source: The ip field's value is set when the RTCIceCandidate() constructor is used. You can't specify the ip in the options object, but the address is automatically extracted from the candidate a-line, if it's formatted properly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RTCIceCandidate() 构造函数时，将设置 ip 字段的值。您不能在options对象中指定 ip ，但如果格式正确，则将从 candidate a行中自动提取该地址。

trans-unit.source: The isAutoLocale read-only property of the IDBIndex interface returns a Boolean indicating whether the index had a locale value of auto specified upon its creation (see createIndex()'s optionalParameters.)
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 isAutoLocale 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 值，该布尔值指示索引在创建时是否具有 auto 指定的 locale 值（请参见 createIndex() 的optionalParameters。）

trans-unit.source: The isAutoLocale value is logged to the console.
trans-unit.target: 该 isAutoLocale 值被记录到控制台。

trans-unit.source: The isChar property has never been supported by any browser but Firefox, and even on Firefox it's never worked except on Mac OSX. For that reason, it's been removed in Firefox 55 to align with other browsers.
trans-unit.target: 该 isChar 财产从来没有被任何浏览器但Firefox的支持，甚至在Firefox它从来没有工作过，除了在Mac OSX。因此，Firefox 55中已将其删除以与其他浏览器保持一致。

trans-unit.source: The isConnected read-only property of the Node interface returns a boolean indicating whether the Node is connected (directly or indirectly) to the context object, for example the Document object in the case of the normal DOM, or the ShadowRoot in the case of a shadow DOM.
trans-unit.target: Node 接口的 isConnected 只读属性返回一个布尔值，该布尔值指示Node是否（直接或间接）连接到上下文对象，例如，在普通DOM中为 Document 对象，在 ShadowRoot 中为ShadowRoot。影子DOM。

trans-unit.source: The isReload read-only property of the FetchEvent interface returns true if the event was dispatched by the user attempting to reload the page, and false otherwise. Pressing the refresh button is a reload while clicking a link and pressing the back button is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件是由尝试重新加载页面的用户调度的，则 FetchEvent 接口的 isReload 只读属性返回 true ,否则返回 false 。在单击链接时，按刷新按钮是重新加载，而按后退按钮则不是。

trans-unit.source: The isTrusted read-only property of the Event interface is a boolean that is true when the event was generated by a user action, and false when the event was created or modified by a script or dispatched via dispatchEvent.
trans-unit.target: Event 接口的 isTrusted 只读属性是一个布尔值，当由用户操作生成事件时为true，而由脚本创建或修改事件或通过dispatchEvent调度事件时为false。

trans-unit.source: The isochronousTransferIn() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBIsochronousInTransferResult when time sensitive information has been transmitted to the USB device.
trans-unit.target: 当对时间敏感的信息已传输到USB设备时， USBDevice 接口的 isochronousTransferIn() 方法返回一个使用 USBIsochronousInTransferResult 解析的 promise 。

trans-unit.source: The isochronousTransferOut() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves with a USBIsochronousOutTransferResult when time sensitive information has been transmitted from the USB device.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 isochronousTransferOut() 方法返回一个 promise ，当已从USB设备传输了对时间敏感的信息时，该承诺将使用 USBIsochronousOutTransferResult 进行解析。

trans-unit.source: The item() method returns a numbered element from an HTMLCollection. In JavaScript, it is easier to treat the HTMLCollection as an array and to index it using array notation. See the example below.
trans-unit.target: 的 item() 方法从一个返回一个编号的元件 HTMLCollection 。在JavaScript中，将 HTMLCollection 视为数组并使用数组表示法对其进行索引更容易。请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: The json() method of the Body mixin takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with the result of parsing the body text as JSON.
trans-unit.target: Body mixin 的 json() 方法获取一个 Response 流，并将其读取完成。它返回一个promise，该promise以将正文文本解析为 JSON 的结果来解析。

trans-unit.source: The key() method of the Storage interface, when passed a number n, returns the name of the nth key in the storage. The order of keys is user-agent defined, so you should not rely on it.
trans-unit.target: 当传递数字n时， Storage 接口的 key() 方法将返回存储中第n个键的名称。键的顺序是用户代理定义的，因此您不应依赖它。

trans-unit.source: The key read-only property of the IDBCursor interface returns the key for the record at the cursor's position. If the cursor is outside its range, this is set to undefined. The cursor's key can be any data type.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 key 只读属性返回光标所在位置记录的键。如果光标超出其范围，则将其设置为undefined。光标键可以是任何数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The keyPath property of the IDBIndex interface returns the key path of the current index. If null, this index is not auto-populated.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 keyPath 属性返回当前索引的键路径。如果为null，则不会自动填充此索引。

trans-unit.source: The keyPath read-only property of the IDBObjectStore interface returns the key path of this object store.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 keyPath 只读属性返回此对象库的密钥路径。

trans-unit.source: The keyboard read-only property of the navigator interface returns a Keyboard object which provides access to functions that retrieve keyboard layout maps and toggle capturing of key presses from the physical keyboard.
trans-unit.target: navigator 界面的 keyboard 只读属性返回一个 Keyboard 对象，该对象提供对以下功能的访问：检索键盘布局图和切换从物理键盘捕获按键的功能。

trans-unit.source: The keydown event is raised when the user presses a keyboard key.
trans-unit.target: 该 keydown 当用户按下一个键盘按键事件引发的。

trans-unit.source: The keyframeEffect is added to the underlying value with which it is combined (aka additive): blur(2) blur(3).
trans-unit.target: 所述 keyframeEffect 被加入到与它相结合（也称为基础值添加剂）： blur(2) blur(3) 。

trans-unit.source: The keyframeEffect value produced is independent of the current iteration.
trans-unit.target: 产生的 keyframeEffect 值与当前迭代无关。

trans-unit.source: The keyframeEffectoverrides the underlying value it is combined with: blur(2) replaces blur(3).
trans-unit.target: 所述 keyframeEffect 覆盖它与结合的基础值： blur(2)  内容替换  blur(3) 。

trans-unit.source: The keys() method of the Cache interface returns a Promise that resolves to an array of Cache keys.
trans-unit.target: Cache 接口的 keys() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为 Cache 键的数组。

trans-unit.source: The keys property of the MediaKeyStatusMap interface returns a new Iterator object, containing keys for each element in the status map, in insertion order.
trans-unit.target: MediaKeyStatusMap 接口的 keys 属性返回一个新的Iterator对象，该对象按插入顺序包含状态图中每个元素的键。

trans-unit.source: The keys read-only property of the KeyboardLayoutMap interface returns a new Array Iterator object that contains the keys for each index in the array.
trans-unit.target: KeyboardLayoutMap 接口的 keys 只读属性返回一个新的Array Iterator对象，该对象包含数组中每个索引的键。

trans-unit.source: The kind property contains a string indicating the category of audio contained in the AudioTrack. The kind can be used to determine the scenarios in which specific tracks should be enabled or disabled. See Audio track kind strings for a list of the kinds available for audio tracks.
trans-unit.target: 该 kind 属性包含字符串表示包含在音频的类别 AudioTrack 。该 kind 可用于确定应启用或禁用特定轨道的方案。有关音频轨道可用种类的列表，请参见音频轨道种类字符串。

trans-unit.source: The kind property contains a string indicating the category of video contained in the VideoTrack. The kind can be used to determine the scenarios in which specific tracks should be enabled or disabled. See Video track kind strings for a list of the kinds available for video tracks.
trans-unit.target: 该 kind 属性包含一个字符串，指示包含在视频的类别 VideoTrack 。该 kind 可用于确定应启用或禁用特定轨道的方案。有关视频轨道可用种类的列表，请参见视频轨道种类字符串。

trans-unit.source: The kind readonly property of the MediaDeviceInfo interface returns an enumerated value, that is either "videoinput", "audioinput" or "audiooutput".
trans-unit.target: MediaDeviceInfo 接口的 kind 只读属性返回一个枚举值，即“ videoinput”，“ audioinput”或“ audiooutput”。

trans-unit.source: The knee property of the DynamicsCompressorNode interface is a k-rateAudioParam containing a decibel value representing the range above the threshold where the curve smoothly transitions to the compressed portion.
trans-unit.target: DynamicsCompressorNode 接口的 knee 属性是k速率 AudioParam ,其中包含分贝值，该分贝值表示高于阈值的范围，在该范围内曲线平滑过渡到压缩部分。

trans-unit.source: The knee property's default value is 30 and it can be set between 0 and 40.
trans-unit.target: 将 knee 属性的默认值是 30 ，它可设置为 0 和 40 。

trans-unit.source: The label readonlyinline property of the MediaDeviceInfo interface returns a DOMString, that is a label describing this device (for example "External USB Webcam"). Only available during active MediaStream use, or when persistent permissions have been granted.
trans-unit.target: MediaDeviceInfo 接口的 label readonlyinline属性返回 DOMString ，它是描述此设备的标签（例如“外部USB网络摄像头”）。仅在活动 MediaStream 使用期间或已授予持久权限时可用。

trans-unit.source: The lang property of the SpeechRecognition interface returns and sets the language of the current SpeechRecognition. If not specified, this defaults to the HTML lang attribute value, or the user agent's language setting if that isn't set either.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognition 接口的 lang 属性返回并设置当前 SpeechRecognition 的语言。如果未指定，则默认为HTML lang 属性值，或者也未设置用户代理的语言设置。

trans-unit.source: The lang property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface gets and sets the language of the utterance.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 lang 属性获取并设置话语的语言。

trans-unit.source: The lang read-only property of the Notification interface indicates the text direction of the notification, as specified in the lang option of the Notification() constructor.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 lang 只读属性指示通知的文本方向，如 Notification() 构造函数的 lang 选项所指定。

trans-unit.source: The lang read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisVoice interface returns a BCP 47 language tag indicating the language of the voice.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisVoice 接口的 lang 只读属性返回一个BCP 47语言标记，该标记指示语音的语言。

trans-unit.source: The lastEventID read-only property of the ExtendableMessageEvent interface represents, in server-sent events, the last event ID of the event source.
trans-unit.target: ExtendableMessageEvent 接口的 lastEventID 只读属性在服务器发送的事件中表示事件源的最后一个事件ID。

trans-unit.source: The lastIndex field is not preserved.
trans-unit.target: 该 lastIndex 的字段不保留。

trans-unit.source: The lastIndex field of RegExp objects is not preserved.
trans-unit.target: RegExp 对象的 lastIndex 字段不会保留。

trans-unit.source: The lax value will only send cookies for TOP LEVEL navigation GET requests. This is sufficient for user tracking, but it will prevent many CSRF attacks.
trans-unit.target: 在 lax 价值将只发送的cookie顶级导航GET请求。这足以进行用户跟踪，但可以防止许多CSRF攻击。

trans-unit.source: The left property of the ScrollToOptions dictionary specifies the number of pixels along the X axis to scroll the window or element.
trans-unit.target: ScrollToOptions 字典的 left 属性指定沿X轴滚动窗口或元素的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The leftDegrees read-only property of the VRFieldOfView interface returns the number of degrees to the left that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: VRFieldOfView 接口的 leftDegrees 只读属性返回视野向左延伸的度数。

trans-unit.source: The leftProjectionMatrix read-only property of the VRFrameData interface returns a Float32Array representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the projection to be used for the left eye’s rendering.
trans-unit.target: VRFrameData 接口的 leftProjectionMatrix 只读属性返回一个 Float32Array ,它表示一个4x4矩阵，该矩阵描述了用于左眼渲染的投影。

trans-unit.source: The leftViewMatrix read-only property of the VRFrameData interface returns a Float32Array representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the view transform to be used for the left eye’s rendering.
trans-unit.target: VRFrameData 接口的 leftViewMatrix 只读属性返回一个 Float32Array ,它表示一个4x4矩阵，该矩阵描述了用于左眼渲染的视图变换。

trans-unit.source: The length property of the AudioBuffer interface returns an integer representing the length, in sample-frames, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 接口的 length 属性返回一个整数，该整数表示样本中存储在缓冲区中的PCM数据的长度（以样本帧为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The length property of the OfflineAudioContext interface returns an integer representing the size of the buffer in sample-frames.
trans-unit.target: OfflineAudioContext 接口的 length 属性返回一个整数，该整数表示样本帧中缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: The length read-only property of the Storage interface returns an integer representing the number of data items stored in the Storage object.
trans-unit.target: Storage 接口的 length 只读属性返回一个整数，该整数表示存储在 Storage 对象中的数据项的数量。

trans-unit.source: The lineCap property determines how the end points of every line are drawn. There are three possible values for this property and those are: butt, round and square. By default this property is set to butt.
trans-unit.target: 该 lineCap 属性决定了每一行的终点绘制。此属性有三个可能的值，分别是： butt ， round 和 square 。默认情况下，此属性设置为 butt 。

trans-unit.source: The lineJoin property determines how two connecting segments (of lines, arcs or curves) with non-zero lengths in a shape are joined together (degenerate segments with zero lengths, whose specified endpoints and control points are exactly at the same position, are skipped).
trans-unit.target: 所述 lineJoin 属性确定如何在一个形状的两个连接段（的线，弧或曲线）具有非零长度连接在一起（简并段具有零米的长度，其指定的端点和控制点是恰好在相同的位置，被跳过） 。

trans-unit.source: The linearAcceleration read-only property of the VRPose interface returns an array representing the linear acceleration vector of the VRDisplay at the current VRPose.timestamp, in meters per second per second.
trans-unit.target: VRPose 接口的 linearAcceleration 只读属性返回一个数组，该数组表示当前 VRPose.timestamp 处 VRDisplay 的线性加速度矢量，以米每秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The linearRampToValueAtTime() method of the AudioParam Interface schedules a gradual linear change in the value of the AudioParam. The change starts at the time specified for the previous event, follows a linear ramp to the new value given in the value parameter, and reaches the new value at the time given in the endTime parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 linearRampToValueAtTime() 的方法 AudioParam 接口时间表在的值逐渐线性变化 AudioParam 。更改从为上一个事件指定的时间开始，然后线性增加到 value 参数中给定的新值，并在 endTime 参数中给定的时间达到新值。

trans-unit.source: The linearVelocity read-only property of the VRPose interface returns an array representing the linear velocity vector of the VRDisplay at the current VRPose.timestamp, in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: VRPose 接口的 linearVelocity 只读属性返回一个数组，该数组表示当前 VRPose.timestamp 处 VRDisplay 的线速度矢量，以米/秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The links read-only property of the Document interface returns a collection of all <area> elements and <a> elements in a document with a value for the href attribute.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 links 只读属性返回文档中所有 <area> 元素和 <a> 元素的集合，并带有href属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The listener property of the BaseAudioContext interface returns an AudioListener object that can then be used for implementing 3D audio spatialization.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 listener 属性返回一个 AudioListener 对象，该对象随后可用于实现3D音频空间化。

trans-unit.source: The load() method of the FontFaceSet forces all the fonts given in parameters to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: FontFaceSet 的 load() 方法强制加载参数中给定的所有字体。

trans-unit.source: The load event fires at the end of the document loading process. At this point, all of the objects in the document are in the DOM, and all the images, scripts, links and sub-frames have finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 所述 load 事件触发在文档加载过程的结束。至此，文档中的所有对象都在DOM中，并且所有图像，脚本，链接和子框架均已完成加载。

trans-unit.source: The loadDictionaryForLanguage() function starts by using getDirectory() to obtain the FileSystemDirectoryEntry object representing a subfolder named "Dictionaries" located inside the specified app data directory. The success callback for this takes the resulting directory entry object and calls getFile() to get a FileSystemFileEntry object representing the dictionary file; the success callback for this, in turn, creates a new FileReader and uses it to load the contents of the file. When that is loaded successfully (as indicated by the loadend event being fired), the loaded text is passed into JSON.parse() to be reconstituted into a JavaScript object.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loadDictionaryForLanguage() 通过使用函数开始 getDirectory() 以获得 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 表示一命名的位于指定的应用数据的目录内“字典”子文件夹中的对象。成功的回调函数将获取结果目录条目对象，并调用 getFile() 获得代表字典文件的 FileSystemFileEntry 对象。为此，成功回调将创建一个新的 FileReader 并使用它来加载文件的内容。成功加载后（如被触发的 loadend 事件所示），加载的文本将传递到 JSON.parse() 重构为JavaScript对象。

trans-unit.source: The loadEventEnd read-only property returns a timestamp which is equal to the time when the load event of the current document is completed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loadEventEnd 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 当完成当前文档的加载事件，其等于时间。

trans-unit.source: The loadEventStart read-only property returns a timestamp representing the time value equal to the time immediately before the load event of the current document is fired.
trans-unit.target: 该 loadEventStart 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示时间值等于当前文档的加载事件被触发之前的时间。

trans-unit.source: The loadRandomAd() function simulates loading an ad and adding it to the page. If you don't pass a value for replaceBox, a new element is created to contain the ad; the ad is then appended to the page. if you specify a replaceBox, that box is treated as an existing ad element; instead of creating a new one, the existing element is changed to contain the new ad's style, content, and other data. This avoids the risk of lengthy layout work being done when you update the ad, which could happen if you first delete the old element then insert a new one.
trans-unit.target: 该 loadRandomAd() 功能模拟加载广告并将其添加到页面。如果您没有传递 replaceBox 的值，则会创建一个新元素来包含广告；然后将广告添加到页面。如果您指定了 replaceBox ，则将该框视为现有广告元素；而不是创建一个新元素，而是将现有元素更改为包含新广告的样式，内容和其他数据。这样可以避免在更新广告时进行冗长的布局工作的风险，如果先删除旧元素然后插入新元素，可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The loadShader() function takes as input the WebGL context, the shader type, and the source code, then creates and compiles the shader as follows:
trans-unit.target: 所述 loadShader() 函数作为输入WebGL的上下文中，着色器类型，和源代码，然后创建并编译的着色器如下：

trans-unit.source: The loadTexture() routine starts by creating a WebGL texture object texture by calling the WebGL createTexture() function. It then uploads a single blue pixel using texImage2D(). This makes the texture immediately usable as a solid blue color even though it may take a few moments for our image to download.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loadTexture() 例程开始通过创建一个WebGL的纹理对象 texture 通过调用WebGL的 createTexture() 函数。然后，它使用 texImage2D() 上传单个蓝色像素。即使下载图像可能需要一些时间，该纹理也可以立即用作纯蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The loadeddata event is fired when the first frame of the media has finished loading.
trans-unit.target: 该 loadeddata 事件被触发时，媒体的第一帧完成加载。

trans-unit.source: The loadedmetadata event is fired when the metadata has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在 loadedmetadata 当元数据已经加载事件。

trans-unit.source: The loadstart event is not fired on <img> elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loadstart 事件不触发对 <img> 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The locale read-only property of the IDBIndex interface returns the locale of the index (for example en-US, or pl) if it had a locale value specified upon its creation (see createIndex()'s optionalParameters.) Note that this property always returns the current locale being used in this index, in other words, it never returns "auto".
trans-unit.target: 如果 IDBIndex 接口的 locale 只读属性在创建时具有指定的 locale 值，则返回索引的语言环境（例如 en-US 或 pl ）（请参见 createIndex() 的optionalParameters。）请注意，此属性总是返回此索引中使用的当前语言环境，换句话说，它永远不会返回 "auto" 。

trans-unit.source: The locale value is logged to the console.
trans-unit.target: 该 locale 的值记录到控制台。

trans-unit.source: The lock() method of the Keyboard interface returns a Promise after enabling the capture of keypresses for any or all of the keys on the physical keyboard. This method can only capture keys that are granted access by the underlying operating system.
trans-unit.target: Keyboard 接口的 lock() 方法为物理键盘上的任何或所有键启用按键捕获后，会返回一个 Promise 。此方法只能捕获由基础操作系统授予访问权限的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The lock() property of the ScreenOrientation interface locks the orientation of the containing document to its default orientation.
trans-unit.target: ScreenOrientation 接口的 lock() 属性将包含文档的方向锁定为其默认方向。

trans-unit.source: The lockOrientation method locks the screen into the specified orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 lockOrientation 方法锁屏到指定的方向。

trans-unit.source: The locked getter property of the ReadableStream interface returns whether or not the readable stream is locked to a reader.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStream 接口的 locked getter属性返回是否将可读流锁定到阅读器。

trans-unit.source: The locked getter property of the WritableStream interface returns a boolean indicating whether the WritableStream is locked to a writer.
trans-unit.target: WritableStream 接口的 locked getter属性返回一个布尔值，该布尔值指示 WritableStream 是否已锁定到编写器。

trans-unit.source: The locked getter returns whether or not the readable stream is locked to a reader.
trans-unit.target: 所述 locked 吸气剂返回流可读是否被锁定到读取器。

trans-unit.source: The locks read-only property of the Navigator interface returns a LockManager object which provides methods for requesting a new Lock object and querying for an existing Lock object.
trans-unit.target: Navigator 界面的 locks 只读属性返回一个 LockManager 对象，该对象提供用于请求新的 Lock 对象和查询现有 Lock 对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: The locks read-only property of the WorkerNavigator interface returns a LockManager object which provides methods for requesting a new Lock object and querying for an existing Lock object.
trans-unit.target: WorkerNavigator 接口的 locks 只读属性返回一个 LockManager 对象，该对象提供用于请求新的 Lock 对象和查询现有 Lock 对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: The log() function adds the specified text to the log. Since we don't know at the time log() is called whether or not it's safe to immediately touch the DOM, we will cache the log text until it's safe to update. Above, in the code for updateDisplay(), you can find the code that actually adds the logged text to the log element when the animation frame is being updated.
trans-unit.target: 该 log() 函数将指定的文本到日志中。由于我们在调用 log() 时尚不知道立即触摸DOM是否安全，因此我们将缓存日志文本，直到可以安全更新为止。上面，在 updateDisplay () 的代码中，您可以找到在更新动画帧时实际上将记录的文本添加到log元素的代码。

trans-unit.source: The log() function creates the log output by getting the current time from a Date object using toLocaleTimeString(), and building a string with the timestamp and the message text. Then the message is appended to the box with the class "log".
trans-unit.target: 的 log() 函数通过从获取当前时间创建日志输出 Date 使用对象 toLocaleTimeString() ，并建立与所述时间戳和消息文本的字符串。然后，将消息添加到带有 "log" 类的框。

trans-unit.source: The log() function is used to output text strings to a <div> so we can share information with the user. Not very pretty but it gets the job done for our purposes.
trans-unit.target: 的 log() 函数是用来输出文本串一个 <div> ，所以我们可以与用户共享的信息。不是很漂亮，但是可以完成我们所要完成的工作。

trans-unit.source: The loop property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface is a Boolean indicating if the audio asset must be replayed when the end of the AudioBuffer is reached.
trans-unit.target: AudioBufferSourceNode 接口的 loop 属性是一个布尔值，指示当到达 AudioBuffer 的末尾时是否必须重播音频资产。

trans-unit.source: The loop property's default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 该 loop 属性的默认值是 false 。

trans-unit.source: The loopEnd property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface specifies is a floating point number specifying, in seconds, at what offset into playing the AudioBuffer playback should loop back to the time indicated by the loopStart property. This is only used if the loop property is true.
trans-unit.target: AudioBufferSourceNode 接口的 loopEnd 属性指定了一个浮点数，以秒为单位，指定播放 AudioBuffer 播放的偏移量应循环回到 loopStart 属性指示的时间。仅在 loop 属性为 true 时使用。

trans-unit.source: The loopStart property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface is a floating-point value indicating, in seconds, where in the AudioBuffer the restart of the play must happen.
trans-unit.target: AudioBufferSourceNode 接口的 loopStart 属性是一个浮点值，以秒为单位，该值指示必须在 AudioBuffer 中重新开始播放的位置。

trans-unit.source: The loopStart property's default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 loopStart 属性的默认值是 0 。

trans-unit.source: The lowSrc property has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 该 lowSrc 属性已被删除。

trans-unit.source: The lower read-only property of the IDBKeyRange interface returns the lower bound of the key range.
trans-unit.target: IDBKeyRange 接口的 lower 只读属性返回键范围的下限。

trans-unit.source: The lowerBound() method of the IDBKeyRange interface creates a new key range with only a lower bound. By default, it includes the lower endpoint value and is closed.
trans-unit.target: IDBKeyRange 接口的 lowerBound() 方法创建仅具有下限的新键范围。默认情况下，它包括较低的端点值并处于关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: The lowerOpen read-only property of the IDBKeyRange interface returns a boolean indicating whether the lower-bound value is included in the key range.
trans-unit.target: IDBKeyRange 接口的 lowerOpen 只读属性返回一个布尔值，该值指示下限值是否包含在键范围内。

trans-unit.source: The main() function in our JavaScript code, is called when our script is loaded. Its purpose is to set up the WebGL context and start rendering content.
trans-unit.target: 加载脚本时，将调用JavaScript代码中的 main() 函数。其目的是建立WebGL上下文并开始呈现内容。

trans-unit.source: The manufacturerName read only property of the USBDevice interface the of the organization that manufactured the USB device.
trans-unit.target: 该 manufacturerName 只读的财产 USBDevice 接口出厂的USB设备的组织。

trans-unit.source: The marionette.enabled preference or --marionette flag is passed.
trans-unit.target: 该 marionette.enabled 偏好或 --marionette 标志传递。

trans-unit.source: The mark'sperformance entry will have the following property values:
trans-unit.target: 该 mark's performance entry 将具有以下属性值：

trans-unit.source: The mark'sperformance entry will have the following property values:
trans-unit.target: 该 mark's performance entry 将具有以下属性值：

trans-unit.source: The mark() method creates a timestamp in the browser's performance entry buffer with the given name. The application defined timestamp can be retrieved by one of the Performance interface's getEntries*() methods (getEntries(), getEntriesByName() or getEntriesByType()).
trans-unit.target: 该 mark() 方法创建一个 timestamp 在浏览器的性能进入缓冲区与给定的名称。可以通过 Performance 接口的 getEntries*() 方法之一（ getEntries() ， getEntriesByName() 或 getEntriesByType() ）检索应用程序定义的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The match() method of the Cache interface returns a Promise that resolves to the Response associated with the first matching request in the Cache object. If no match is found, the Promise resolves to undefined.
trans-unit.target: Cache 接口的 match() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为与 Cache 对象中的第一个匹配请求关联的 Response 。如果未找到匹配项，则 Promise 解析为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: The match() method of the CacheStorage interface (available globally as caches) checks if a given Request or url string is a key for a stored Response. This method returns a Promise for a Response, or undefined if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: CacheStorage 接口的 match() 方法（可作为 caches 全局使用）检查给定的 Request 或url字符串是否是存储的 Response 的键。此方法返回 Promise for Response ，如果未找到匹配项，则返回 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: The matchAll() method of the Cache interface returns a Promise that resolves to an array of all matching requests in the Cache object.
trans-unit.target: Cache 接口的 matchAll() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为 Cache 对象中所有匹配请求的数组。

trans-unit.source: The matchAll() method of the Clients interface returns a Promise for a list of service worker Client objects. Include the options parameter to return all service worker clients whose origin is the same as the associated service worker's origin. If options are not included, the method returns only the service worker clients controlled by the service worker.
trans-unit.target: Clients 接口的 matchAll() 方法返回 Promise ,用于提供服务工作者 Client 对象的列表。包括 options 参数，以返回其起源与关联的Service Worker的起源相同的所有Service Worker客户端。如果不包括选项，则该方法仅返回由服务工作者控制的服务工作者客户端。

trans-unit.source: The matches read-only property of the MediaQueryList interface is a Boolean that returns true if the document currently matches the media query list, or false if not.
trans-unit.target: 本 matches 只读财产 MediaQueryList 接口是一个 Boolean 是返回 true 如果 document 当前匹配的媒体查询列表，或 false 如果不是。

trans-unit.source: The matches read-only property of the MediaQueryListEvent interface is a Boolean that returns true if the document currently matches the media query list, or false if not.
trans-unit.target: 本 matches 只读财产 MediaQueryListEvent 接口是一个 Boolean 是返回 true 如果 document 当前匹配的媒体查询列表，或 false 如果不是。

trans-unit.source: The max property provides the maximum sensing distance the sensor is able to report, in centimeters.
trans-unit.target: 在 max 性能提供了最大感应距离的传感器能够报告，以厘米为单位。

trans-unit.source: The max read-only property of the MediaSettingsRange interface returns the maximum value of the settings range.
trans-unit.target: MediaSettingsRange 接口的 max 只读属性返回设置范围的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maxAlternatives property of the SpeechRecognition interface sets the maximum number of SpeechRecognitionAlternatives provided per SpeechRecognitionResult.
trans-unit.target: 所述 maxAlternatives 所述的属性 SpeechRecognition 接口设置的最大数目 SpeechRecognitionAlternative 每只要S SpeechRecognitionResult 。

trans-unit.source: The maxDecibels property of the AnalyserNode interface is a double value representing the maximum power value in the scaling range for the FFT analysis data, for conversion to unsigned byte/float values — basically, this specifies the maximum value for the range of results when using getFloatFrequencyData() or getByteFrequencyData().
trans-unit.target: 所述 maxDecibels 所述的属性 AnalyserNode 接口是表示在定标范围的FFT分析数据的最大功率值的双精度值，以便转换成无符号字节/浮点值-基本上，这规定最大为结果的范围使用时，值 getFloatFrequencyData() 或 getByteFrequencyData() 。

trans-unit.source: The maxDistance property of the PannerNode interface is a double value representing the maximum distance between the audio source and the listener, after which the volume is not reduced any further. This value is used only by the linear distance model.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 maxDistance 属性是一个双精度值，代表音频源和侦听器之间的最大距离，此后音量不再减小。此值仅由 linear 距离模型使用。

trans-unit.source: The maxDistance property's default value is 10000.
trans-unit.target: 该 maxDistance 属性的默认值是 10000 。

trans-unit.source: The maxLayers read-only property of the VRDisplayCapabilities interface returns a number indicating the maximum number of VRLayers that the VR display can present at once (e.g. the maximum length of the array that Display.requestPresent() can accept.)
trans-unit.target: VRDisplayCapabilities 接口的 maxLayers 只读属性返回一个数字，该数字指示VR显示器可以一次显示的 VRLayer 的最大数量（例如， Display.requestPresent() 可以接受的数组的最大长度。）

trans-unit.source: The maxTouchPoints read-only property of the Navigator interface returns the maximum number of simultaneous touch contact points are supported by the current device.
trans-unit.target: Navigator 界面的 maxTouchPoints 只读属性返回当前设备支持的最大同时触摸接触点数。

trans-unit.source: The maxValue read-only property of the AudioParam interface represents the maximum possible value for the parameter's nominal (effective) range.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 maxValue 只读属性表示参数的名义（有效）范围的最大可能值。

trans-unit.source: The maxchannelCount property of the AudioDestinationNode interface is an unsigned long defining the maximum amount of channels that the physical device can handle.
trans-unit.target: AudioDestinationNode 接口的 maxchannelCount 属性是一个 unsigned long 整数，定义了物理设备可以处理的最大信道数量。

trans-unit.source: The maximumFieldOfView read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface describes the maximum supported field of view for the current eye.
trans-unit.target: 该 maximumFieldOfView 只读财产 VREyeParameters 接口描述当前的眼睛最大视场的支持。

trans-unit.source: The measure'sperformance entry will have the following property values:
trans-unit.target: 该 measure's performance entry 将具有以下属性值：

trans-unit.source: The measure'sperformance entry will have the following property values:
trans-unit.target: 该 measure's performance entry 将具有以下属性值：

trans-unit.source: The measure() method creates a named timestamp in the browser's performance entry buffer between two specified marks (known as the start mark and end mark, respectively). The named timestamp is referred to as a measure.
trans-unit.target: 的 measure() 方法创建一个名为 timestamp 在浏览器的性能条目缓冲器两个指定的标记（被称为之间开始标记和结束标记，分别地）。命名的时间戳称为度量。

trans-unit.source: The measure can be retrieved by one of the Performance interface's getEntries*() methods (getEntries(), getEntriesByName() or getEntriesByType()).
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 Performance 接口的 getEntries*() 方法之一（ getEntries() ， getEntriesByName() 或 getEntriesByType() ）来检索该 measure 。

trans-unit.source: The media read-only property of the MediaQueryListEvent interface is a DOMString representing a serialized media query.
trans-unit.target: MediaQueryListEvent 接口的 media 只读属性是 DOMString ,它表示序列化的媒体查询。

trans-unit.source: The menu attribute and type="menu" value have been removed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 menu 的属性和 type="menu" 的值已经被去除。

trans-unit.source: The message parameter is serialized using the structured clone algorithm. This means you can pass a broad variety of data objects safely to the destination window without having to serialize them yourself.
trans-unit.target: 使用结构化克隆算法对 message 参数进行序列化。这意味着您可以将各种数据对象安全地传递到目标窗口，而不必自己序列化它们。

trans-unit.source: The message parameter must be a string.
trans-unit.target: 该 message 参数必须是一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message read-only property of the DOMException interface returns a DOMString representing a message or description associated with the given error name.
trans-unit.target: DOMException 接口的 message 只读属性返回一个 DOMString ,它表示与给定错误名关联的消息或描述。

trans-unit.source: The metadata property of the MediaSession interface, returns an instance of MediaMetadata which contains rich media metadata, for display in a platform UI.
trans-unit.target: MediaSession 接口的 metadata 属性返回包含媒体元数据的 MediaMetadata 实例，以显示在平台UI中。

trans-unit.source: The method read-only property of the Request interface contains the request's method (GET, POST, etc.)
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 method 只读属性包含请求的方法（ GET ， POST 等）。

trans-unit.source: The methodData read-only property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface returns an array of PaymentMethodData objects containing payment method identifers for the payment methods that the web site accepts and any associated payment method specific data.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 methodData 只读属性返回一个 PaymentMethodData 对象数组，其中包含网站接受的支付方式的支付方式标识符以及任何与之相关的特定于支付方式的数据。

trans-unit.source: The methodName read-only property of the PaymentResponse interface returns a string uniquely identifying the payment handler selected by the user. This string may be either one of the standardized payment method identifiers or a URL used by the payment handler to process payments.
trans-unit.target: PaymentResponse 接口的 methodName 只读属性返回一个字符串，该字符串唯一标识用户选择的付款处理程序。该字符串可以是标准化付款方式标识符之一，也可以是付款处理程序用来处理付款的URL。

trans-unit.source: The min property provides the minimum distance the sensor can report, in centimeters.
trans-unit.target: 该 min 属性提供的最小距离的传感器可以报告，以厘米为单位。

trans-unit.source: The min read-only property of the MediaSettingsRange interface returns the minimum value of the settings range.
trans-unit.target: MediaSettingsRange 接口的 min 只读属性返回设置范围的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The minDecibels property of the AnalyserNode interface is a double value representing the minimum power value in the scaling range for the FFT analysis data, for conversion to unsigned byte/float values — basically, this specifies the minimum value for the range of results when using getFloatFrequencyData() or getByteFrequencyData().
trans-unit.target: 所述 minDecibels 所述的属性 AnalyserNode 接口是表示在定标范围的FFT分析数据的最小功率值的双精度值，以便转换成无符号字节/浮点值-基本上，这个指定最小为结果的范围使用时，值 getFloatFrequencyData() 或 getByteFrequencyData() 。

trans-unit.source: The minValue read-only property of the AudioParam interface represents the minimum possible value for the parameter's nominal (effective) range.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 minValue 只读属性表示参数的标称（有效）范围的最小可能值。

trans-unit.source: The minimumFieldOfView read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface describes the minimum supported field of view for the current eye.
trans-unit.target: VREyeParameters 接口的 minimumFieldOfView 只读属性描述了当前眼睛支持的最小视野。

trans-unit.source: The miterLimit property determines how far the outside connection point can be placed from the inside connection point. If two lines exceed this value, a bevel join gets drawn instead. Note that the maximum miter length is the product of the line width measured in the current coordinate system, by the value of this miterLimit property (whose default value is 10.0 in the HTML <canvas>), so the miterLimit can be set independently from the current display scale or any affine transforms of paths: it only influences the effectively rendered shape of line edges.
trans-unit.target: 的 miterLimit 分别属性确定多远外部连接点可以从内部连接点被放置。如果两行超过此值，则会绘制一个斜角连接。注意，最大斜切长度是当前测量的线宽度的乘积坐标系统中，由这个值 miterLimit 分别属性（其缺省值是10.0的HTML <canvas> ），所以 miterLimit 分别可以独立于被设置当前的显示比例或路径的任何仿射变换：它仅影响线边缘的有效渲染形状。

trans-unit.source: The mode property of the ShadowRoot specifies its mode — either open or closed. This defines whether or not the shadow root's internal features are accessible from JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 该 mode 的财产 ShadowRoot 指定它的模式-无论是 open 或 closed 。这定义了是否可以从JavaScript访问影根的内部功能。

trans-unit.source: The mode property of the options parameter may be either "exclusive" or "shared".
trans-unit.target: options 参数的 mode 属性可以是 "exclusive" 或 "shared" 。

trans-unit.source: The mode read-only property of the IDBTransaction interface returns the current mode for accessing the data in the object stores in the scope of the transaction (i.e. is the mode to be read-only, or do you want to write to the object stores?) The default value is readonly.
trans-unit.target: IDBTransaction 接口的 mode 只读属性返回在事务范围内访问对象存储中数据的当前模式（即，该模式为只读模式，还是要写入对象存储？ ）默认值为 readonly 。

trans-unit.source: The mode read-only property of the Lock interface returns the access mode passed to LockManager.request() when the lock was requested. The mode is either "exclusive" (the default) or "shared".
trans-unit.target: 当请求锁定时， Lock 接口的 mode 只读属性返回传递给 LockManager.request() 的访问模式。该模式为 "exclusive" （默认）或 "shared" 。

trans-unit.source: The mode read-only property of the Request interface contains the mode of the request (e.g., cors, no-cors, same-origin, or navigate.) This is used to determine if cross-origin requests lead to valid responses, and which properties of the response are readable.
trans-unit.target: 该 mode 只读的属性 Request 接口包含请求的模式（例如， cors ， no-cors ， same-origin ，或 navigate ）。这是用于确定是否跨域请求导致有效的响应，并且其响应的属性是可读的。

trans-unit.source: The modifiers read-only property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface returns an array of objects containing changes to payment details.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 modifiers 只读属性返回一个包含付款明细更改的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The mousedown event is raised when the user presses the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 该 mousedown 当用户按下鼠标按钮事件被引发。

trans-unit.source: The mouseenter event is fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved over the element that has the listener attached.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mouseenter 当指向设备（通常为小鼠）移过贴有听者的元件事件被触发。

trans-unit.source: The mouseleave event is fired when a pointing device (usually a mouse) is moved off the element that has the listener attached.
trans-unit.target: 的 mouseleave 当指向设备（通常为小鼠）移离贴有侦听器元件事件被触发。

trans-unit.source: The mousemove event is raised when the user moves the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 的 mousemove ，当用户移动鼠标事件被引发。

trans-unit.source: The mozFrameBufferLength property can be set to a new value for lower latency, larger amounts of data, etc. The size given must be a number between 512 and 16384. Using any other size results in an exception being thrown. The best time to set a new length is after the loadedmetadata event fires, when the audio info is known, but before the audio has started or MozAudioAvailable events have begun firing.
trans-unit.target: 该 mozFrameBufferLength 属性可以被设置为一个新的值用于低等待时间，更大量的数据，等等给出的尺寸必须是512和16384之间的数使用任何其它尺寸导致抛出异常。设置新长度的最佳时间是在知道音频信息的情况下，在loadmetadata事件触发后，但在音频开始或 MozAudioAvailable 事件开始触发之前，设置新的长度。

trans-unit.source: The multiEntry read-only property of the IDBIndex interface returns a boolean value that affects how the index behaves when the result of evaluating the index's key path yields an array.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 multiEntry 只读属性返回一个布尔值，当评估索引键路径的结果产生一个数组时，该布尔值会影响索引的行为。

trans-unit.source: The muted read-only property of the MediaStreamTrack interface returns a Boolean value indicating whether or not the track is currently unable to provide media output.
trans-unit.target: MediaStreamTrack 接口的已 muted 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 值，该布尔值指示轨道当前是否无法提供媒体输出。

trans-unit.source: The myArray.myMethod function is passed to setTimeout, then when it's called, its this is not set so it defaults to the window object. There's also no option to pass a thisArg to setTimeout as there is in Array methods like forEach, reduce, etc. and as shown below, using call to set this doesn't work either.
trans-unit.target: 该 myArray.myMethod 函数传递到 setTimeout 的，那么当它的名字，它的 this 没有设置，因此默认为 window 对象。也没有将 thisArg 传递给setTimeout的选项，因为像forEach，reduce等Array方法中一样，并且如下所示，使用 call 来设置 this 也不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The nackCount property of the RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary is a numeric value indicating the number of times the receiver sent a NACK packet to the sender. A NACK (Negative ACKnowledgement, also called "Generic NACK") packet tells the sender that one or more of the RTP packets it sent were lost in transport.
trans-unit.target: RTCRtpStreamStats 词典的 nackCount 属性是一个数字值，指示接收方向发送方发送NACK数据包的次数。 NACK（负确认，也称为“通用NACK”）数据包告诉发送方它发送的一个或多个RTP数据包在传输中丢失。

trans-unit.source: The name property of the Credential interface returns a DOMString, containing the name associated with a credential. It should be a human-readable, public name.
trans-unit.target: Credential 接口的 name 属性返回一个 DOMString ，其中包含与凭据关联的名称。它应该是人类可读的公共名称。

trans-unit.source: The name property of the HTMLSlotElement interface returns or sets the slot name. A slot is a placeholder inside a web component that users can fill with their own markup.
trans-unit.target: HTMLSlotElement 接口的 name 属性返回或设置插槽名称。插槽是Web组件内的占位符，用户可以使用自己的标记来填充。

trans-unit.source: The name property of the IDBIndex interface contains a string which names the index.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 name 属性包含一个为索引命名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The name property of the IDBObjectStore interface indicates the name of this object store.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 name 属性指示此对象库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name property of the PerformanceEntry interface returns a value that further specifies the value returned by the PerformanceEntry.entryType property. This property is read only.
trans-unit.target: PerformanceEntry 接口的 name 属性返回一个值，该值进一步指定 PerformanceEntry.entryType 属性返回的值。该属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property of the DOMException interface returns a DOMString that contains one of the strings associated with an error name.
trans-unit.target: DOMException 接口的 name 只读属性返回一个 DOMString ，其中包含与错误name相关联的字符串之一。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property of the Lock interface returns the name passed to LockManager.request selected when the lock was requested.
trans-unit.target: Lock 接口的 name 只读属性返回在请求锁定时传递给 LockManager.request 的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property of the PasswordCredential interface returns a USVSTring containing a human-readable public name for display in a credential chooser.
trans-unit.target: PasswordCredential 接口的 name 只读属性返回 USVSTring ，该USVSTring包含人类可读的公共名称，以在凭证选择器中显示。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the name associated with certain types of events occuring as the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text is being spoken: the name of the SSML marker reached in the case of a mark event, or the type of boundary reached in the case of a boundary event.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 name 只读属性返回与 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text 时发生的某些事件类型相关联的名称：如果发生 mark 事件，则到达SSML标记的名称，或者到达边界的类型在 boundary 事件的情况下。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface returns the name associated with certain types of events occuring as the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.text is being spoken: the name of the SSML marker reached in the case of a mark event, or the type of boundary reached in the case of a boundary event.
The name read-only property of the IDBDatabase interface is a DOMString that contains the name of the connected database.
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 name 只读属性是 DOMString ，其中包含连接的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name read-only property returns a DOMString value of the server-specified metric name.
trans-unit.target: 该 name 只读属性返回一个 DOMString 服务器指定的度量标准名称的价值。

trans-unit.source: The navigate() method of the WindowClient interface loads a specified URL into a controlled client page then returns a Promise that resolves to the existing WindowClient.
trans-unit.target: 该 navigate() 的方法 WindowClient 接口负载指定的URL为控制客户端页面，然后返回一个 Promise 能解决现有 WindowClient 。

trans-unit.source: The navigationPreload read-only property of the FetchEvent interface returns a Promise that resolves to the instance of NavigationPreloadManager associated with the current service worker registration.
trans-unit.target: FetchEvent 接口的 navigationPreload 只读属性返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为与当前服务工作程序注册关联的 NavigationPreloadManager 实例。

trans-unit.source: The navigationPreload read-only property of the ServiceWorkerRegistration interface returns the NavigationPreloadManager associated with the current service worker registration.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerRegistration 接口的 navigationPreload 只读属性返回与当前服务工作者注册关联的 NavigationPreloadManager 。

trans-unit.source: The navigator.webdriver property is true when in:
trans-unit.target: 该 navigator. webdriver 属性为true：

trans-unit.source: The navigator.onLine attribute must return false if the user agent will not contact the network when the user follows links or when a script requests a remote page (or knows that such an attempt would fail)...
trans-unit.target: 该 navigator.onLine 属性必须返回false，如果用户遵循链接时，或当脚本请求远程页面（或者知道这种尝试会失败）用户代理不会接触网络...

trans-unit.source: The near property tell if there is an object close to the device (true) or not (false).
trans-unit.target: 在 near 属性告诉我们，如果有物体靠近设备（ true ，否则为 false ）。

trans-unit.source: The newVersion read-only property of the IDBVersionChangeEvent interface returns the new version number of the database.
trans-unit.target: IDBVersionChangeEvent 接口的 newVersion 只读属性返回数据库的新版本号。

trans-unit.source: The nextHopProtocol read-only property is a string representing the network protocol used to fetch the resource, as identified by the ALPN Protocol ID (RFC7301).
trans-unit.target: 所述 nextHopProtocol 只读属性是一个 string 表示网络协议用于获取资源，所确定的ALPN协议ID（RFC7301） 。

trans-unit.source: The nodeType property can be used to distinguish different kind of nodes, such that elements, text and comments, from each other.
trans-unit.target: 该 nodeType 属性可被用于区分不同类型的节点，以使得 elements ， text 和 comments ，从对方。

trans-unit.source: The noiseSuppression cconstraint indicates whether or not the browser offers the ability to automatically control the gain (volume) on media tracks; this obviously is contingent on whether or not the individual device supports automatic gain control as well.
trans-unit.target: 该 noiseSuppression cconstraint表示是否浏览器提供自动控制在媒体轨道增益（体积比）的能力; 显然，这取决于单个设备是否也支持自动增益控制。

trans-unit.source: The nonce property of the HTMLElement interface returns the cryptographic number used once that is used by Content Security Policy to determine whether a given fetch will be allowed to proceed.
trans-unit.target: HTMLElement 接口的 nonce 属性返回一次使用的密码，该密码由内容安全策略用于确定是否将允许进行给定的提取。

trans-unit.source: The normalize() method has been modified so that Text node can also be normalized if the proper DOMConfiguration flag is set.
trans-unit.target: 的 normalize() 方法已被修改，使得 Text ，如果适当的节点也可以被归一化 DOMConfiguration 标志被设置。

trans-unit.source: The normalize() method has been moved to Node.
trans-unit.target: 的 normalize() 方法已经被移动到 Node 。

trans-unit.source: The normalize property of the ConvolverNode interface is a boolean that controls whether the impulse response from the buffer will be scaled by an equal-power normalization when the buffer attribute is set, or not.
trans-unit.target: ConvolverNode 接口的 normalize 属性是一个布尔值，它控制是否在设置 buffer 属性时用等幂归一化来缩放来自缓冲区的冲激响应。

trans-unit.source: The noteReleased() function is the event handler called when the user releases the mouse button or moves the mouse out of the key that's currently playing.
trans-unit.target: 该 noteReleased() 函数调用该事件处理程序，当用户释放鼠标按键或鼠标移出，因此目前起着关键的。

trans-unit.source: The notification read-only property of the NotificationEvent interface returns the instance of the Notification that was clicked to fire the event. The Notification provides read-only access to many properties that were set at the instantiation time of the Notification such as tag and data attributes that allow you to store information for defered use in the notificationclick event.
trans-unit.target: 该 notification 只读财产 NotificationEvent 接口返回的情况下 Notification 说被点击触发事件。该 Notification 提供只读到设定在通知的实例化时，例如，许多属性和访问 tag 和 data 属性，让您存储信息在DEFERED使用 notificationclick 事件。

trans-unit.source: The numberOfChannels property of the AudioBuffer interface returns an integer representing the number of discrete audio channels described by the PCM data stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 接口的 numberOfChannels 属性返回一个整数，该整数表示由存储在缓冲区中的PCM数据描述的离散音频通道的数量。

trans-unit.source: The numberOfInputs property of the AudioNode interface returns the number of inputs feeding the node. Source nodes are defined as nodes having a numberOfInputs property with a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: AudioNode 接口的 numberOfInputs 属性返回输入节点的输入数。源节点被定义为具有 numberOfInputs 属性且值为0的节点。

trans-unit.source: The numberOfOutputs property of the AudioNode interface returns the number of outputs coming out of the node. Destination nodes — like AudioDestinationNode — have a value of 0 for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: AudioNode 接口的 numberOfOutputs 属性返回从节点出来的输出数量。目的节点（例如 AudioDestinationNode )的此属性值为0。

trans-unit.source: The objectStore() method of the IDBTransaction interface returns an object store that has already been added to the scope of this transaction.
trans-unit.target: IDBTransaction 接口的 objectStore() 方法返回一个已添加到此事务范围内的对象存储。

trans-unit.source: The objectStore property of the IDBIndex interface returns the name of the object store referenced by the current index.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 objectStore 属性返回当前索引引用的对象存储的名称。

trans-unit.source: The objectStoreNames read-only property of the IDBDatabase interface is a DOMStringList containing a list of the names of the object stores currently in the connected database.
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 objectStoreNames 只读属性是 DOMStringList ,其中包含当前在连接的数据库中的对象存储的名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: The objectStoreNames read-only property of the IDBTransaction interface returns a DOMStringList of names of IDBObjectStore objects.
trans-unit.target: IDBTransaction 接口的 objectStoreNames 只读属性返回 IDBObjectStore 对象名称的 DOMStringList 。

trans-unit.source: The observe() method of the PerformanceObserver interface is used to specify the set of performance entry types to observe. The performance entry types are specified as an array of DOMString objects, each naming one entry type; the type names are documented in Performance entry type names in PerformanceEntry.entryType.
trans-unit.target: PerformanceObserver 接口的 observe() 方法用于指定要观察的性能条目类型集。性能条目类型被指定为 DOMString 对象的数组，每个对象都命名一种条目类型。类型名称都记录在性能条目类型名称中PerformanceEntry.entryType。

trans-unit.source: The offset argument is optional.
trans-unit.target: 该 offset 参数可选。

trans-unit.source: The offset read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface
trans-unit.target: VREyeParameters 接口的 offset 只读属性

trans-unit.source: The offsetLeft read-only property of the VisualViewport interface returns the offset of the left edge of the visual viewport from the left edge of the layout viewport in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 offsetLeft 只读属性返回视觉视口的左边缘相对于布局视口的左边缘以CSS像素为单位的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The offsetTop read-only property of the VisualViewport interface returns the offset of the top edge of the visual viewport from the top edge of the layout viewport in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 offsetTop 只读属性返回视觉视口的顶部边缘与布局视口的顶部边缘之间的偏移量（以CSS像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The offsetX read-only property of the MouseEvent interface provides the offset in the X coordinate of the mouse pointer between that event and the padding edge of the target node.
trans-unit.target: MouseEvent 接口的 offsetX 只读属性提供该事件与目标节点的填充边缘之间鼠标指针X坐标的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The offsetY read-only property of the MouseEvent interface provides the offset in the Y coordinate of the mouse pointer between that event and the padding edge of the target node.
trans-unit.target: MouseEvent 接口的 offsetY 只读属性提供该事件与目标节点的填充边缘之间鼠标指针的Y坐标中的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The oldVersion read-only property of the IDBVersionChangeEvent interface returns the old version number of the database.
trans-unit.target: IDBVersionChangeEvent 接口的 oldVersion 只读属性返回数据库的旧版本号。

trans-unit.source: The onabort event handler of the IDBTransaction interface handles the abort event, fired, when the current transaction is aborted via the IDBTransaction.abort method.
trans-unit.target: 当当前事务通过 IDBTransaction.abort 方法中止时， IDBTransaction 接口的 onabort 事件处理程序处理触发的中止事件。

trans-unit.source: The onabort read-only property of the FetchSignal interface is an event handler Invoked when an abort event fires, i.e. when the fetch request(s) the signal is communicating with is/are aborted.
trans-unit.target: FetchSignal 接口的 onabort 只读属性是事件处理程序，该事件处理程序在 abort 事件触发时（即，在与信号进行通信的读取请求时）异常中止时调用。

trans-unit.source: The onactivateEventHandler is called when one of the Sensor interface's child interfaces becomes active.
trans-unit.target: 该 onactivate EventHandler ，当传感器接口的子接口中的一个被激活时调用。

trans-unit.source: The onaudioend property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the user agent has finished capturing audio (when the audioend event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 所述 onaudioend 所述的属性 SpeechRecognition 接口表示的事件处理程序，当用户代理具有完成捕获的音频，将运行（在时 audioend 事件触发）。

trans-unit.source: The onaudioprocess event handler of the ScriptProcessorNode interface represents the EventHandler to be called for the audioprocess event that is dispatched to ScriptProcessorNode node types. An event of type AudioProcessingEvent will be dispatched to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: ScriptProcessorNode 接口的 onaudioprocess 事件处理程序表示要为分配给 ScriptProcessorNode 节点类型的 audioprocess 事件调用的 EventHandler 。类型 AudioProcessingEvent 的事件将分派给事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The onaudiostart property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the user agent has started to capture audio (when the audiostart event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onaudiostart 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序，当用户代理已经开始捕获音频，将运行（在当 audiostart 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onblocked event handler of the IDBOpenDBRequest interface is the event handler for the blocked event. This event is triggered when the upgradeneeded should be triggered because of a version change but the database is still in use (that is, not closed) somewhere, even after the versionchange event was sent.
trans-unit.target: 所述 onblocked 所述的事件处理程序 IDBOpenDBRequest 接口是事件处理程序 blocked 事件。当由于版本更改而触发 upgradeneeded 需要触发该事件时，即使在发送了 versionchange 事件之后，仍在某个地方使用数据库（即未关闭），也会触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The onboundary property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the spoken utterance reaches a word or sentence boundary (when the boundary event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onboundary 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在语音到达单词或句子的边界时触发（当 boundary 事件触发时）。

trans-unit.source: The oncanplay property sets and returns the event handler for the canplay event.
trans-unit.target: 该 oncanplay 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 canplay 事件。

trans-unit.source: The oncanplaythrough property sets and returns the event handler for the canplaythrough event.
trans-unit.target: 该 oncanplaythrough 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 canplaythrough 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onchange property of the ScreenOrientation is an event handler fired whenever is the EventHandler called when the screen changes orientation.
trans-unit.target: ScreenOrientation 的 onchange 属性是一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序在屏幕更改方向时调用 EventHandler 时触发。

trans-unit.source: The onchange property sets and returns the event handler for the change event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onchange 特性集和回报的事件处理程序的 change 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onclick property of the Notification interface specifies an event listener to receive click events. These events occur when the user clicks on a displayed Notification.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 onclick 属性指定一个事件侦听器，以接收 click 事件。这些事件在用户单击显示的 Notification 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The onclose event handler of the IDBDatabase interface handles the close event, which is fired when the database is unexpectedly closed. This can happen, for example, when the application is shut down or access to the disk the database is stored on is lost while the database is open.
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 onclose 事件处理程序处理 close 事件，该事件在数据库意外关闭时触发。例如，当应用程序关闭或打开数据库时，丢失了对存储数据库的磁盘的访问时，可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The onclose property of the Notification interface specifies an event listener to receive close events. These events occur when a Notification is closed.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 onclose 属性指定一个事件侦听器以接收 close 事件。这些事件在 Notification 关闭时发生。

trans-unit.source: The onclose property of the WorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the close event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: WorkerGlobalScope 接口的 onclose 属性表示一个 EventHandler ，该事件将在 close 事件发生并通过 Worker 冒泡时被调用。

trans-unit.source: The oncomplete event handler of the IDBTransaction interface handles the complete event, fired when the transaction successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: IDBTransaction 接口的 oncomplete 事件处理程序处理完成事件，该事件在事务成功完成时触发。

trans-unit.source: The oncomplete event handler of the OfflineAudioContext interface is called when the audio processing is terminated, that is when the complete event (of type OfflineAudioCompletionEvent) is raised.
trans-unit.target: 音频处理终止时，即引发 complete 事件（类型为 OfflineAudioCompletionEvent ）时，将调用 OfflineAudioContext 接口的 oncomplete 事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The onconnect property of the USB interface is an event handler called whenever a paired device is connected.
trans-unit.target: USB 接口的 onconnect 属性是一个事件处理程序，只要连接了配对的设备，该事件处理程序就会被调用。

trans-unit.source: The oncuechange property sets and returns the event handler for the cuechange event.
trans-unit.target: 该 oncuechange 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 cuechange 事件。

trans-unit.source: The ondisconnect property of the USB is an event handler called whenever a paired device is disconnected.
trans-unit.target: USB 的 ondisconnect 属性是一个事件处理程序，每当配对的设备断开连接时，就会调用该事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The ondurationchange property sets and returns the event handler for the durationchange event.
trans-unit.target: 该 ondurationchange 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 durationchange 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onemptied property sets and returns the event handler for the emptied event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onemptied 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序为 emptied 的事件。

trans-unit.source: The onencrypted property of the HTMLMediaElement is an event handler, fired whenever an encrypted event occurs, denoting the media is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 的 onencrypted 属性是一个事件处理程序，只要发生 encrypted 事件就触发，表示媒体已加密。

trans-unit.source: The onend property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the speech recognition service has disconnected (when the end event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onend 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序时，语音识别服务已断开，将运行（在当 end 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onend property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the utterance has finished being spoken (when the end event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onend 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在说完语音后（在触发 end 事件时）运行。

trans-unit.source: The onended event handler for the AudioScheduledSourceNode interface specifies an EventHandler to be executed when the ended event occurs on the node. This event is sent to the node when the concrete interface (such as AudioBufferSourceNode, OscillatorNode, or ConstantSourceNode) determines that it has stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: AudioScheduledSourceNode 接口的 onended 事件处理程序指定在节点上发生 ended 事件时要执行的 EventHandler 。当具体接口（例如 AudioBufferSourceNode ， OscillatorNode 或 ConstantSourceNode ）确定已停止播放时，将此事件发送到节点。

trans-unit.source: The onended property of the OscillatorNode interface is used to set the event handler for the ended event, which fires when the tone has stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: OscillatorNode 接口的 onended 属性用于设置end事件的事件处理程序，该事件处理程序在音调停止播放时触发。

trans-unit.source: The onended property sets and returns the event handler for the ended event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onended 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 ended 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onerror event handler of the IDBRequest interface handles the error event, fired when a request returns an error.
trans-unit.target: IDBRequest 接口的 onerror 事件处理程序处理 error 事件，该错误事件在请求返回错误时触发。

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the HTMLMediaElement interface specifies an event listener function which will receive error events sent to the media element. These events occur when some form of error occurs while attempting to load or perform the media.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 接口的 onerror 属性指定事件侦听器函数，该函数将接收发送到media元素的 error 事件。当尝试加载或执行媒体时发生某种形式的错误时，就会发生这些事件。

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the Notification interface specifies an event listener to receive error events. These events occur when something goes wrong with a Notification (in many cases an error preventing the notification from being displayed.)
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 onerror 属性指定一个事件侦听器以接收 error 事件。当 Notification 发生问题时会发生这些事件（在许多情况下，该错误会阻止显示通知。）

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface is an event handler fired whenever an error event occurs in the associated service workers.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerContainer 接口的 onerror 属性是一个事件处理程序，只要在关联的服务工作程序中发生 error 事件，就会触发该事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when a speech recognition error occurs (when the error event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognition 接口的 onerror 属性表示事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在语音识别错误发生时（错误事件触发时）运行。

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when an error occurs that prevents the utterance from being succesfully spoken (when the error event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onerror 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在发生错误时运行，以防止成功说出话语（在 error 事件触发时）。

trans-unit.source: The onerror property of the WorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the error event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: WorkerGlobalScope 接口的 onerror 属性表示发生 error 事件并在 Worker 中冒泡时要调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onerrorEventHandler is called when an error occurs on one of the child interfaces of the Sensor interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 onerror 的 EventHandler 时，在的子接口中的一个出现错误被称为 Sensor 接口。

trans-unit.source: The ongoingTouchIndexById() function below scans through the ongoingTouches array to find the touch matching the given identifier, then returns that touch's index into the array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 ongoingTouchIndexById() 函数将 ongoingTouches 数组，以找到与给定标识符匹配的触摸，然后将该触摸的索引返回到数组中。

trans-unit.source: The ongotpointercaptureEventHandler property of the GlobalEventHandlers interface returns the event handler (function) for the gotpointercapture event type.
trans-unit.target: GlobalEventHandlers 接口的 ongotpointercapture EventHandler 属性返回 gotpointercapture 事件类型的事件处理程序（函数）。

trans-unit.source: The oninvalid property sets and returns the event handler for the invalid event.
trans-unit.target: 该 oninvalid 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序为 invalid 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onkeystatuseschange property of the MediaKeySession is an event handler, fired whenever a keystatuschange event ocurrs, denoting there has been a change in the keys or their statuses within a session.
trans-unit.target: 该 onkeystatuseschange 的财产 MediaKeySession 是事件处理程序，发射每当 keystatuschange 事件ocurrs，表示出现了一个会话中键或他们的状态的变化。

trans-unit.source: The onlanguagechange property of the WorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the languagechange event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: WorkerGlobalScope 接口的 onlanguagechange 属性表示在发生 languagechange 事件并在 Worker 中冒泡时要调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onload property of the GlobalEventHandlers mixin is an event handler for the load event of a Window, XMLHttpRequest, <img> element, etc., which fires when the resource has loaded.
trans-unit.target: 所述 onload 所述的属性 GlobalEventHandlers 混入是用于一个事件处理程序 load 事件 a的 Window ， XMLHttpRequest 的， <img> 元件等，当资源已经加载哪个火灾。

trans-unit.source: The onloadeddata property sets and returns the event handler for the loadeddata event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onloadeddata 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 loadeddata 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onloadedmetadata property sets and returns the event handler for the loadedmetadata event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onloadedmetadata 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 loadedmetadata 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onloadend property of the GlobalEventHandlers mixin is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadend event is raised (when progress has stopped on the loading of a resource.)
trans-unit.target: GlobalEventHandlers mixin 的 onloadend 属性是一个 EventHandler ,表示引发 loadend 事件时（资源加载进度停止时）要调用的代码。

trans-unit.source: The onloadstart property of the GlobalEventHandlers mixin is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the loadstart event is raised (when progress has begun on the loading of a resource.)
trans-unit.target: GlobalEventHandlers mixin 的 onloadstart 属性是一个 EventHandler ,表示引发 loadstart 事件时（资源加载开始时）要调用的代码。

trans-unit.source: The onlostpointercaptureEventHandler property of the GlobalEventHandlers interface returns the event handler (function) for the lostpointercapture event type.
trans-unit.target: GlobalEventHandlers 接口的 onlostpointercapture EventHandler 属性返回 lostpointercapture 事件类型的事件处理程序（函数）。

trans-unit.source: The only() method of the IDBKeyRange interface creates a new key range containing a single value.
trans-unit.target: IDBKeyRange 接口的 only() 方法创建一个包含单个值的新键范围。

trans-unit.source: The onmark property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the spoken utterance reaches a named SSML mark tag (when the mark event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onmark 属性表示事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在语音到达命名的SSML标记标签时（在 mark 事件触发时）运行。

trans-unit.source: The onmark property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the spoken utterance reaches a named SSML mark tag (when the mark event fires.)

The onmessage handler allows us to run some code whenever a message is received, with the message itself being available in the message event's data attribute. Here we simply multiply together the two numbers then use postMessage() again, to post the result back to the main thread.
trans-unit.target: 该 onmessage 处理程序允许我们运行只要接收到消息的一些代码，与正在可用信息本身 message 事件的 data 属性。在这里，我们简单地将两个数字相乘，然后再次使用 postMessage() 将结果发布回主线程。

trans-unit.source: The onmessage property of the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the message event occurs and bubbles through the Worker — i.e. when a message is sent to the worker using the Worker.postMessage method.
trans-unit.target: DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 onmessage 属性表示发生 message 事件并通过 Worker 冒泡时（即，使用 Worker.postMessage 方法将消息发送给Worker时）要调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onmessage property of the MediaKeySession is an event handler, fired whenever a MediaKeyMessageEvent ocurrs, denoting a message is generated by the content decryption module.
trans-unit.target: MediaKeySession 的 onmessage 属性是一个事件处理程序，每当出现 MediaKeyMessageEvent 时触发，表示内容解密模块生成了一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The onmessage property of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface is an event handler fired whenever a message event occurs — when incoming messages are received to the ServiceWorkerContainer object (e.g., via a MessagePort.postMessage() call).
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerContainer 接口的 onmessage 属性是 message 事件发生时触发的事件处理程序—当收到传入的消息到 ServiceWorkerContainer 对象时（例如，通过 MessagePort.postMessage() 调用）。

trans-unit.source: The onmessage property of the WindowEventHandlers is the EventHandler called whenever an object receives a message event.
trans-unit.target: WindowEventHandlers 的 onmessage 属性是在对象收到 message 事件时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onmessage property of the Worker interface represents an EventHandler, that is a function to be called when the message event occurs. These events are of type MessageEvent and will be called when the worker's parent receives a message (i.e. from the DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage method.
trans-unit.target: Worker 接口的 onmessage 属性表示 EventHandler ，它是发生 message 事件时要调用的函数。这些事件的类型为 MessageEvent ,并且在工作人员的父级收到消息时（即从 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope.postMessage 方法接收）将被调用。

trans-unit.source: The onmousedown property returns the onmousedown event handler code on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该 onmousedown 事件属性返回 onmousedown 事件目前的元素上的事件处理程序代码。

trans-unit.source: The onmouseenter property sets and returns the event handler for the mouseenter event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onmouseenter 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 mouseenter 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onmouseleave property sets and returns the event handler for the mouseleave event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onmouseleave 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 mouseleave 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onnomatch property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the speech recognition service returns a final result with no significant recognition (when the nomatch event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onnomatch 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序时，语音识别服务返回无显著识别最终结果将运行（在当 nomatch 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onoffline property of the WorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the offline event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: WorkerGlobalScope 接口的 onoffline 属性表示当发生 offline 事件并在 Worker 中冒泡时要调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The ononline property of the WorkerGlobalScope interface represents an EventHandler to be called when the online event occurs and bubbles through the Worker.
trans-unit.target: WorkerGlobalScope 接口的 ononline 属性表示一个 EventHandler ，该事件将在 online 事件发生并通过 Worker 冒泡时被调用。

trans-unit.source: The onpause property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the utterance is paused part way through (when the pause event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onpause 的财产 SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口代表一个事件处理程序时，话语是通过暂停一部分的方式，将运行时（ pause 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onpause property sets and returns the event handler for the pause event.
trans-unit.target: 该 onpause 属性设置或返回的事件处理程序的 pause 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onreadingEventHandler is called when a reading is taken on one of the child interfaces of the Sensor interface.
trans-unit.target: 该 onreading EventHandler 时，读取读数上的子接口中的一个被称为 Sensor 接口。

trans-unit.source: The onresize event handler of the VisualViewport interface is the EventHandler called when a viewport is resized.
trans-unit.target: 调整视口大小时， VisualViewport 接口的 onresize 事件处理程序为 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onresourcetimingbufferfull property is an event handler that will be called when the resourcetimingbufferfull event is fired. This event is fired when the browser's resource timing performance buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 该 onresourcetimingbufferfull 属性是 event handler 时，将调用 resourcetimingbufferfull 事件。当浏览器的资源计时性能缓冲区已满时，将触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The onresult property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the speech recognition service returns a result — a word or phrase has been positively recognized and this has been communicated back to the app (when the result event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onresult 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序将运行时的语音识别服务会返回一个结果-一个词或短语已经积极认可，这已经传回给应用程序（在当 result 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onresume property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when a paused utterance is resumed (when the resume event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onresume 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在恢复暂停的语音时（当 resume 事件触发时）运行。

trans-unit.source: The onscroll event handler of the VisualViewport interface is the EventHandler called when a viewport is scrolled.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 onscroll 事件处理程序是滚动视口时调用的 EventHandler 。

trans-unit.source: The onshippingaddresschange event of the PaymentRequest interface is fired whenever the user changes their shipping address, including when an address is added by the user for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户更改其收货地址（包括用户首次添加地址）时，都会触发 PaymentRequest 接口的 onshippingaddresschange 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onshippingoptionchange event of the PaymentRequest interface is fired whenever the user changes a shipping option.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户更改送货选项时，都会触发 PaymentRequest 接口的 onshippingoptionchange 事件。

trans-unit.source: The onshow property of the Notification interface specifies an event listener to receive show events. These events occur when a Notification is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 onshow 属性指定一个事件侦听器以接收 show 事件。这些事件在显示 Notification 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The onsoundend property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has stopped being detected (when the soundend event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onsoundend 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序将运行在任何声音-语音识别或不- （的时候已经停止被检测 soundend 。事件触发）

trans-unit.source: The onsoundstart property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when any sound — recognisable speech or not — has been detected (when the soundstart event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onsoundstart 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序时的任何声音，将运行-识别语音与否- （中当检测 soundstart 。事件触发）

trans-unit.source: The onspeechend property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when speech recognised by the speech recognition service has stopped being detected (when the speechend event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onspeechend 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序时的讲话所确认的语音识别服务已停止被检测将运行（在当 speechend 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onspeechstart property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when sound recognised by the speech recognition service as speech has been detected (when the speechstart event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 该 onspeechstart 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序，语音已经检测到的声音所确认的语音识别服务将运行（在当 speechstart 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onstart property of the SpeechRecognition interface represents an event handler that will run when the speech recognition service has begun listening to incoming audio with intent to recognize grammars associated with the current SpeechRecognition (when the start event fires.)
trans-unit.target: 在 onstart 的财产 SpeechRecognition 接口代表一个事件处理程序将运行时的语音识别服务已经开始听意图识别与当前相关的语法输入音频 SpeechRecognition （在当 start 事件触发。）

trans-unit.source: The onstart property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface represents an event handler that will run when the utterance has begun to be spoken (when the start event fires.)
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 onstart 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在开始说出语音时（在 start 事件触发时）运行。

trans-unit.source: The onstatechange property of the BaseAudioContext interface defines an event handler function to be called when the statechange event fires: this occurs when the audio context's state changes.
