trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 onstatechange 属性定义一个 statechange 处理程序事件，该事件处理程序函数在statechange事件触发时调用：当音频上下文的状态更改时，将发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The onsuccess event handler of the IDBRequest interface handles the success event, fired when the result of a request is successfully returned.
trans-unit.target: IDBRequest 接口的 onsuccess 事件处理程序处理 success 事件，该事件在成功返回请求结果时触发。

trans-unit.source: The ontonechange property of the RTCDTMFSender interface is used to set the event handler for the tonechange event, which is sent to the RTCDTMFSender each time a tone begins or ends. The event handler receives as input a single parameter of type RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent, which describes the change.
trans-unit.target: RTCDTMFSender 接口的 ontonechange 属性用于设置 tonechange 事件的事件处理程序，每次音频开始或结束时，该事件处理程序都会发送到 RTCDTMFSender 。事件处理程序接收描述为更改的 RTCDTMFToneChangeEvent 类型的单个参数作为输入。

trans-unit.source: The onupgradeneeded property of the IDBOpenDBRequest interface is the event handler for the upgradeneeded event, triggered when a database of a bigger version number than the existing stored database is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该 onupgradeneeded 的财产 IDBOpenDBRequest 接口是事件处理程序 upgradeneeded 事件，当被加载比现有的存储数据库中的大版本号的数据库触发。

trans-unit.source: The onversionchange event handler of the IDBDatabase interface handles the versionchange event, fired when a database structure change (IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded event or IDBFactory.deleteDatabase) was requested elsewhere (most probably in another window/tab on the same computer).
trans-unit.target: IDBDatabase 接口的 onversionchange 事件处理程序处理版本更改事件，当在其他地方（很可能在同一台计算机的另一个窗口/选项卡中）请求数据库结构更改（ IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded 事件或 IDBFactory.deleteDatabase ）时触发。

trans-unit.source: The onvrdisplayactivate property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when a display is able to be presented to (when the vrdisplayactivate event fires), for example if an HMD has been moved to bring it out of standby, or woken up by being put on.
trans-unit.target: Window 界面的 onvrdisplayactivate 属性表示事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在能够显示显示时（在 vrdisplayactivate 事件触发时）运行，例如，如果将HMD移至使其退出待机状态，或者被唤醒被戴上。

trans-unit.source: The onvrdisplayblur property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when presentation to a display has been paused for some reason by the browser, OS, or VR hardware (when the vrdisplayblur event fires) — for example, while the user is interacting with a system menu or browser, to prevent tracking or loss of experience.
trans-unit.target: Window 界面的 onvrdisplayblur 属性表示事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在浏览器，OS或VR硬件出于某种原因（当触发 vrdisplayblur 事件时）暂停对显示的演示时运行（例如，当用户进行交互时）与系统菜单或浏览器配合使用，以防止跟踪或失​​去体验。

trans-unit.source: The onvrdisplaydeactivate property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when a display can no longer be presented to (when the vrdisplaydeactivate event fires), for example if an HMD has gone into standby or sleep mode due to a period of inactivity.
trans-unit.target: Window 界面的 onvrdisplaydeactivate 属性表示一个事件处理程序，它将在不再显示显示时（在触发 vrdisplaydeactivate 事件时）运行，例如，如果HMD由于一段时间不活动而进入待机或睡眠模式。

trans-unit.source: The onvrdisplayfocus property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when presentation to a display has resumed after being blurred (when the vrdisplayfocus event fires).
trans-unit.target: Window 接口的 onvrdisplayfocus 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在模糊显示后（当 vrdisplayfocus 事件触发时）恢复对显示的显示。

trans-unit.source: The onvrdisplaypresentchange property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when the presenting state of a VR display changes — i.e. goes from presenting to not presenting, or vice versa (when the vrdisplaypresentchange event fires).
trans-unit.target: Window 接口的 onvrdisplaypresentchange 属性表示一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序将在VR显示器的呈现状态更改时运行，即从呈现状态变为不呈现状态，反之亦然（当 vrdisplaypresentchange 事件触发时）。

trans-unit.source: The onwaitingforkey property of the HTMLMediaElement is an event handler, fired when a waitingforkey event occurs, when playback is blocked while waiting for an encryption key.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 的 onwaitingforkey 属性是一个事件处理程序，在发生 waitingforkey 事件，在等待加密密钥的同时阻止播放时触发。

trans-unit.source: The onwheel property returns the onwheel event handler code on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 该 onwheel 属性返回 onwheel 当前元素上的事件处理程序代码。

trans-unit.source: The open() method creates a new secondary browser window, similar to choosing New Window from the File menu. The strUrl parameter specifies the URL to be fetched and loaded in the new window. If strUrl is an empty string, then a new blank, empty window (URL about:blank) is created with the default toolbars of the main window.
trans-unit.target: 该 open() 方法创建一个新的辅助浏览器窗口，类似于从文件菜单中选择新窗口。该 strUrl 参数指定URL加以取出，并在新窗口中加载。如果 strUrl 是一个空字符串，则将使用主窗口的默认工具栏创建一个新的空白窗口（URL about:blank ）。

trans-unit.source: The open() method of the CacheStorage interface returns a Promise that resolves to the Cache object matching the cacheName.
trans-unit.target: CacheStorage 接口的 open() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为与 cacheName 匹配的 Cache 对象。

trans-unit.source: The open() method of the IDBFactory interface requests opening a connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: IDBFactory 接口的 open() 方法请求打开与数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: The open() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a device session has started.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 open() 方法返回一个 promise ，该承诺将在设备会话开始时解析。

trans-unit.source: The open property of the HTMLDialogElement interface is a Boolean reflecting the open HTML attribute, indicating whether the dialog is available for interaction.
trans-unit.target: HTMLDialogElement 接口的 open 属性是一个 Boolean 反映了 open HTML属性，指示对话框是否可用于交互。

trans-unit.source: The openCursor() function takes several arguments. First, you can limit the range of items that are retrieved by using a key range object that we'll get to in a minute. Second, you can specify the direction that you want to iterate. In the above example, we're iterating over all objects in ascending order. The success callback for cursors is a little special. The cursor object itself is the result of the request (above we're using the shorthand, so it's event.target.result). Then the actual key and value can be found on the key and value properties of the cursor object. If you want to keep going, then you have to call continue() on the cursor. When you've reached the end of the data (or if there were no entries that matched your openCursor() request) you still get a success callback, but the result property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 该 openCursor() 函数有几个参数。首先，您可以使用我们稍后将要到达的键范围对象来限制所检索项目的范围。其次，您可以指定要迭代的方向。在上面的示例中，我们以升序遍历所有对象。游标的成功回调有些特殊。游标对象本身是请求的 result （在上面，我们使用了简写形式，因此它是 event.target.result ）。然后可以在光标对象的 key 和 value 属性上找到实际的键和值。如果要继续前进，则必须调用 continue() 在光标上。当您到达数据末尾时（或者如果没有与 openCursor() 请求匹配的条目），您仍然会获得成功回调，但是 result 属性是 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: The openCursor() method of the IDBIndex interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, creates a cursor over the specified key range.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 openCursor() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中，在指定键范围内创建一个游标。

trans-unit.source: The openCursor() method of the IDBObjectStore interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, returns a new IDBCursorWithValue object. Used for iterating through an object store with a cursor.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 openCursor() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中返回一个新的 IDBCursorWithValue 对象。用于使用游标遍历对象存储。

trans-unit.source: The openKeyCursor() method of the IDBIndex interface returns an IDBRequest object, and, in a separate thread, creates a cursor over the specified key range, as arranged by this index.
trans-unit.target: IDBIndex 接口的 openKeyCursor() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，并在一个单独的线程中，在由该索引安排的指定键范围内创建一个游标。

trans-unit.source: The openKeyCursor() method of the IDBObjectStore interface returns an IDBRequest object whose result will be set to an IDBCursor that can be used to iterate through matching results. Used for iterating through the keys of an object store with a cursor.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 openKeyCursor() 方法返回一个 IDBRequest 对象，其结果将设置为 IDBCursor ，可用于迭代匹配结果。用于使用游标遍历对象存储的键。

trans-unit.source: The openWindow() method of the Clients interface creates a new top level browsing context and loads a given URL. If the calling script doesn't have permission to show popups, openWindow() will throw an InvalidAccessError.
trans-unit.target: Clients 接口的 openWindow() 方法创建一个新的顶级浏览上下文并加载给定的URL。如果调用脚本没有显示弹出窗口的权限，则 openWindow() 将引发InvalidAccessError。

trans-unit.source: The openWindow property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface opens the specified URL in a new window, if and only if the given URL is on the same origin as the calling page. It returns a Promise that resolves with a reference to a WindowClient.
trans-unit.target: 如果且仅当给定URL与调用页面位于同一来源时， PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 openWindow 属性会在新窗口中打开指定的URL。它返回一个 Promise ，该Promise通过引用 WindowClient 来解决。

trans-unit.source: The opened read only property of the USBDevice interface indicates whether a session has been started with a paired USB device. A device must be opened before it can conrolled by a web page.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的“ opened 只读”属性指示是否已与配对的USB设备启动会话。必须先打开设备，然后才能通过网页对其进行控制。

trans-unit.source: The options argument is optional. When provided, it is an Object which can contain the following properties:
trans-unit.target: 该 options 参数是可选。提供时，它是一个 Object ，可以包含以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The options object passed into the IntersectionObserver() constructor let you control the circumstances under which the observer's callback is invoked. It has the following fields:
trans-unit.target: 传递给 IntersectionObserver() 构造函数的 options 对象使您可以控制在哪些情况下调用观察者的回调。它具有以下字段：

trans-unit.source: The options parameter is an object which is based on the FileSystemFlags dictionary; it provides flags which make it possible to adjust the behavior of the getDirectory() method.
trans-unit.target: 该 options 参数是基于所述对象 FileSystemFlags 字典; 它提供了一些标志，这些标志使调整 getDirectory() 方法的行为成为可能。

trans-unit.source: The options parameter is an object which is based on the FileSystemFlags dictionary; it provides flags which make it possible to adjust the behavior of the getFile() method.
trans-unit.target: 该 options 参数是基于所述对象 FileSystemFlags 字典; 它提供了一些标志，这些标志使调整 getFile() 方法的行为成为可能。

trans-unit.source: The options parameter with a applicationServerKey value is required.
trans-unit.target: 带有 applicationServerKey 值的 options 参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The options read-only property of the PushSubscription interface is an object containing containing the options used to create the subscription.
trans-unit.target: PushSubscription 接口的 options 只读属性是一个对象，其中包含用于创建预订的选项。

trans-unit.source: The organization read-only property of the PaymentAddress interface returns a string containing the name of the organization, firm, company, or institution at the address.
trans-unit.target: PaymentAddress 接口的 organization 只读属性返回一个字符串，其中包含该地址处的组织，公司，公司或机构的名称。

trans-unit.source: The orientation read-only property of the VRPositionState interface returns the orientation of the sensor at the current VRPose.timestamp, as a quarternion value.
trans-unit.target: VRPositionState 接口的“ orientation 只读属性将传感器在当前 VRPose.timestamp 处的方向返回为四分之一度值。

trans-unit.source: The orientationX property of the PannerNode interface indicates the X (horizontal) component of the direction in which the audio source is facing, in a 3D Cartesian coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 orientationX 属性指示在3D笛卡尔坐标空间中音频源所面向的方向的X（水平）分量。

trans-unit.source: The orientationY property of the PannerNode interface indicates the Y (vertical) component of the direction the audio source is facing, in 3D Cartesian coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 所述 orientationY 所述的属性 PannerNode 接口指示音频源面对的方向的Y（垂直）分量，在三维笛卡尔坐标空间。

trans-unit.source: The orientationZ property of the PannerNode interface indicates the Z (depth) component of the direction the audio source is facing, in 3D Cartesian coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 orientationZ 属性指示在3D笛卡尔坐标空间中音频源面向的方向的Z（深度）分量。

trans-unit.source: The outerHTML attribute of the Element DOM interface gets the serialized HTML fragment describing the element including its descendants. It can also be set to replace the element with nodes parsed from the given string.
trans-unit.target: Element DOM接口的 outerHTML 属性获取描述元素（包括其后代）的序列化HTML片段。也可以设置为将元素替换为从给定字符串解析的节点。

trans-unit.source: The outputLatency read-only property of the AudioContext Interface provides an estimation of the output latency of the current audio context.
trans-unit.target: AudioContext 接口的 outputLatency 只读属性提供对当前音频上下文的输出延迟的估计。

trans-unit.source: The oversample property of the WaveShaperNode interface is an enumerated value indicating if oversampling must be used. Oversampling is a technique for creating more samples (up-sampling) before applying a distortion effect to the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: WaveShaperNode 接口的 oversample 属性是一个枚举值，指示是否必须使用过采样。过采样是一种在对音频信号施加失真效果之前创建更多采样（上采样）的技术。

trans-unit.source: The ownerDocument of doctype nodes (that is, nodes for which Node.nodeType is Node.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE or 10) is no longer null. Instead, the ownerDocument is the document on which document.implementation.createDocumentType() was called.
trans-unit.target: doctype节点（即 Node.nodeType 为 Node.DOCUMENT_TYPE_NODE 或10的节点）的 ownerDocument 不再为null。相反， ownerDocument 是在其上调用 document.implementation.createDocumentType() 的文档。

trans-unit.source: The ownerDocument property was slightly modified so that DocumentFragment also returns null.
trans-unit.target: 对该 ownerDocument 属性进行了少许修改，以便 DocumentFragment 也返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The pageLeft read-only property of the VisualViewport interface returns the x coordinate relative to the initial containing block origin of the left edge of the visual viewport, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 pageLeft 只读属性返回相对于可视视口左边缘的初始包含块原点的x坐标，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The pageTop read-only property of the VisualViewport interface returns the y coordinate relative to the initial containing block origin of the top edge of the visual viewport, in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 pageTop 只读属性返回相对于视觉视口顶部边缘的初始包含块原点的y坐标，以CSS像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The pageXOffset property is an alias for the scrollX property:
trans-unit.target: 该 pageXOffset 属性是一个别名 scrollX 属性：

trans-unit.source: The pageYOffset property is an alias for the scrollY property:
trans-unit.target: 该 pageYOffset 属性是一个别名 scrollY 属性：

trans-unit.source: The pan property of the StereoPannerNode interface is an a-rateAudioParam representing the amount of panning to apply. The value can range between -1 (full left pan) and 1 (full right pan).
trans-unit.target: StereoPannerNode 接口的 pan 属性是一个a-rate AudioParam ,代表要应用的平移量。该值的范围是 -1 （左全角）和 1 （右全角）。

trans-unit.source: The panningModel property of the PannerNode interface is an enumerated value determining which spatialisation algorithm to use to position the audio in 3D space.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 panningModel 属性是一个枚举值，用于确定要使用哪种空间化算法将音频定位在3D空间中。

trans-unit.source: The parse() method of the CSSStyleValue interface sets a specific CSS property to the specified values and returns the first value as a CSSStyleValue object.
trans-unit.target: CSSStyleValue 接口的 parse() 方法将特定的CSS属性设置为指定的值，然后将第一个值作为 CSSStyleValue 对象返回。

trans-unit.source: The parseAll() method of the CSSStyleValue interface sets all occurences of a specific CSS property to the specified valueand returns an array of CSSStyleValue objects, each containing one of the supplied values.
trans-unit.target: CSSStyleValue 接口的 parseAll() 方法将特定CSS属性的所有出现都设置为指定的值，并返回 CSSStyleValue 对象的数组，每个对象都包含提供的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The password read-only property of the PasswordCredential interface returns a USVString containing the password of the credential.
trans-unit.target: PasswordCredential 接口的 password 只读属性返回一个 USVString ,其中包含凭据的密码。

trans-unit.source: The passwordName property of the PasswordCredential interface returns a USVString, depicting the name used by the password field, when submitting the current object to a remote endpoint via fetch. This property defaults to 'password', but may be matched to anything your backend service expects.
trans-unit.target: 当通过 fetch 将当前对象提交到远程端点时， PasswordCredential 接口的 passwordName 属性返回一个 USVString ，描述了password字段使用的名称。此属性默认为 'password' ，但可以与您的后端服务期望的任何内容匹配。

trans-unit.source: The pause event is fired when playback has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 在 pause 时播放已暂停事件。

trans-unit.source: The pause event is thrown as a result of the MediaRecorder.pause() method being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 由于调用 MediaRecorder.pause() 方法而引发了 pause 事件。

trans-unit.source: The paused read-only property of the SpeechSynthesis interface is a Boolean that returns true if the SpeechSynthesis object is in a paused state, or false if not.
trans-unit.target: 在 paused 了的只读属性 SpeechSynthesis 接口是一个 Boolean 即返回 true 如果 SpeechSynthesis 对象处于暂停状态，或 false 如果不是。

trans-unit.source: The payerName readonly property of the PaymentResponse interface returns the name supplied by the user. This option is only present when the requestPayerName option is set to true in the options parameter of the PaymentRequest() constructor.
trans-unit.target: PaymentResponse 接口的 payerName 只读属性返回用户提供的名称。仅当在 PaymentRequest() 构造函数的options参数中将 requestPayerName 选项设置为 true 时，此选项才存在。

trans-unit.source: The paymentRequestId read-only property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface returns the ID of the PaymentRequest object.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 paymentRequestId 只读属性返回 PaymentRequest 对象的ID 。

trans-unit.source: The paymentRequestOrigin read-only property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface returns the origin where the PaymentRequest object was initialized.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 paymentRequestOrigin 只读属性返回初始化 PaymentRequest 对象的来源。

trans-unit.source: The pending read-only property of the SpeechSynthesis interface is a Boolean that returns true if the utterance queue contains as-yet-unspoken utterances.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesis 接口的 pending 只读属性是一个 Boolean ，如果语音队列中包含尚未发音的语音，则该布尔值返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: The pendingLocalDescription contains not just the offer or answer under consideration, but any local ICE candidates which have already been gathered since the offer or answer was created. Similarly, pendingRemoteDescription includes any remote ICE candidates which have been provided by calls to RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate().
trans-unit.target: 该 pendingLocalDescription 不仅包含报价或正在考虑的答案，但因为要约或答案被创建已经收集的任何地方ICE候选人。同样， pendingRemoteDescription 包括通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 提供的任何远程ICE候选对象。

trans-unit.source: The permission read-only property of the Notification interface indicates the current permission granted by the user for the current origin to display web notifications.
trans-unit.target: Notification 界面的 permission 只读属性指示用户为当前来源显示的Web通知授予的当前权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissionState() method of the PushManager interface returns a Promise that resolves to a DOMString indicating the permission state of the push manager. Possible values are 'prompt', 'denied', or 'granted'.
trans-unit.target: PushManager 接口的 permissionState() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为 DOMString ,指示推送管理器的许可状态。可能的值为 'prompt' ， 'denied' 或 'granted' 。

trans-unit.source: The persist() method of the StorageManager interface requests permission to use persistent storage, and returns a Promise that resolves to true if permission is granted and box mode is persistent, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: StorageManager 接口的 persist() 方法请求使用持久性存储的权限，并返回一个 Promise ，如果已授予许可且框模式为持久性，则该解析为 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: The persisted property of the StorageManager interface returns a Promise that resolves to true if box mode is persistent for your site's storage.
trans-unit.target: 如果框模式对于您的站点的存储而言是持久的，则 StorageManager 界面的 persisted 属性将返回一个 Promise ，该承诺将解析为 true 。

trans-unit.source: The pipeThrough() method of the ReadableStream interface provides a chainable way of piping the current stream through a transform stream or any other writable/readable pair.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStream 接口的 pipeThrough() 方法提供了一种可链接的方式，通过转换流或任何其他可写/可读对来传递当前流。

trans-unit.source: The pipeTo() method of the ReadableStream interface pipes the current ReadableStream to a given WritableStream and returns a promise that fulfills when the piping process completes successfully, or rejects if any errors were encountered.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStream 接口的 pipeTo() 方法将当前 ReadableStream 通过管道传递给给定的 WritableStream ,并返回一个诺言，该诺言在管道过程成功完成时会实现，或者在遇到任何错误时拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The pitch property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface gets and sets the pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 pitch 属性获取并设置说话时的音调。

trans-unit.source: The pixels parameter now accepts an ArrayBufferView of type Uint16Array and Uint32Array.
trans-unit.target: 的 pixels 参数现在接受 ArrayBufferView 类型的 Uint16Array 和 Uint32Array 。

trans-unit.source: The play() method of the Web Animations API's Animation Interface starts or resumes playing of an animation. If the animation is finished, calling play() restarts the animation, playing it from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: Web动画API的 Animation 接口的 play() 方法可开始或恢复动画的播放。如果动画结束，则调用 play() 重新启动动画，从头开始播放。

trans-unit.source: The playTone() function's job is to play a tone at the given frequency. This will be used by the handler for events triggering keys on the keyboard to start playing the appropriate notes.
trans-unit.target: 在 playTone() 函数的任务是在给定频率播放提示音。处理程序将使用它来触发键盘上的事件以触发键盘上的相应音调。

trans-unit.source: The playbackRate property of the AudioBufferSourceNode interface Is a k-rateAudioParam that defines the speed at which the audio asset will be played.
trans-unit.target: 所述 playbackRate 所述的属性 AudioBufferSourceNode 接口是K-速率 AudioParam 限定在其中音频资产将被播放的速度。

trans-unit.source: The playbackState property of the MediaSession interface indicates whether the current media session is playing.
trans-unit.target: MediaSession 接口的 playbackState 属性指示当前的媒体会话是否正在播放。

trans-unit.source: The pliCount property of the RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary states the number of times the stream's receiving end sent a Picture Loss Indication (PLI) packet to the sender. A PLI packet indicates that some amount of encoded video data has been lost for one or more frames.
trans-unit.target: RTCRtpStreamStats 词典的 pliCount 属性说明流的接收端向发送方发送图片丢失指示（PLI）数据包的次数。PLI数据包指示已丢失一个或多个帧的一些已编码视频数据。

trans-unit.source: The plugins read-only property of the Document interface returns an HTMLCollection object containing one or more HTMLEmbedElements representing the <embed> elements in the current document.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 plugins 只读属性返回一个 HTMLCollection 对象，该对象包含一个或多个 HTMLEmbedElement ,它们表示当前文档中的 <embed> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The pname parameter is a Glenum specifying the texture parameter to set. The param parameter is a GLfloat or GLint specifying the value for the specified parameter pname.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pname 参数是 Glenum 指定纹理参数集。所述 param 参数是 GLfloat 或 GLint 指定所述指定的参数的值 pname 。

trans-unit.source: The pointerLockElement property provides the element set as the target for mouse events while the pointer is locked. It is null if lock is pending, pointer is unlocked, or the target is in another document.
trans-unit.target: 当锁定指针时， pointerLockElement 属性将元素设置为鼠标事件的目标。如果锁未决，指针被解锁或目标在另一个文档中，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The policy read-only property of the Document interface returns the Policy interface which provides a simple API for introspecting the feature policies applied to a specific document.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 policy 只读属性返回 Policy 接口，该接口提供了一个简单的API，用于内省应用于特定文档的功能策略。

trans-unit.source: The policy read-only property of the HTMLIFrameElement interface returns the Policy interface which provides a simple API for introspecting the feature policies applied to a specific document.
trans-unit.target: HTMLIFrameElement 接口的 policy 只读属性返回 Policy 接口，该接口提供了一个简单的API，用于内省应用于特定文档的功能策略。

trans-unit.source: The populateMatrix method of the OrientationSensor interface populates the given target matrix with the rotation matrix based on the latest sensor reading. The rotation maxtrix is shown below.
trans-unit.target: OrientationSensor 接口的 populateMatrix 方法基于最新的传感器读数，使用旋转矩阵填充给定的目标矩阵。旋转最大值显示如下。

trans-unit.source: The populateStorage() function sets three items in local storage — the background color, font, and image path. It then runs the setStyles() function to update the page styles, etc.
trans-unit.target: 所述 populateStorage() 函数设置在本地存储三个项目-背景颜色，字体和图像的路径。然后，它运行 setStyles() 函数以更新页面样式等。

trans-unit.source: The pose read-only property of the VRFrameData interface returns the VRPose of the VRDisplay at the current VRFrameData.timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 该 pose 只读财产 VRFrameData 接口返回 VRPose 中的 VRDisplay 在当前 VRFrameData.timestamp 。

trans-unit.source: The position read-only property of the VRPose interface returns the position of the VRDisplay at the current VRPose.timestamp as a 3D vector.
trans-unit.target: VRPose 接口的 position 只读属性将 VRDisplay 在当前 VRPose.timestamp 处的位置作为3D向量返回。

trans-unit.source: The position specified is not a recognised value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 position 不是可识别的值。

trans-unit.source: The positionX property of the PannerNode interface specifies the X coordinate of the audio source's position in 3D Cartesian coordinates, corresponding to the horizontal axis (left-right).
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 positionX 属性以3D直角坐标指定音频源位置的X坐标，该坐标对应于水平轴（左右）。

trans-unit.source: The positionX read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the x position of the listener in 3D cartesian space.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 positionX 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示侦听器在3D笛卡尔空间中的x位置。

trans-unit.source: The positionY property of the PannerNode interface specifies the Y coordinate of the audio source's position in 3D Cartesian coordinates, corresponding to the vertical axis (top-bottom). The complete vector is defined by the position of the audio source, given as (positionX, positionY, positionZ), and the orientation of the audio source (that is, the direction in which it's facing), given as (orientationX, orientationY, orientationZ).
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 positionY 属性以3D笛卡尔坐标指定音频源位置的Y坐标，该坐标对应于垂直轴（上下）。完整的向量由下式给出为（所述音频源的位置，规定 positionX ， positionY ， positionZ ），和音频源的朝向（即，在哪个方向它的朝向），作为（给出 orientationX ， orientationY ， orientationZ ）。

trans-unit.source: The positionY read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the y position of the listener in 3D cartesian space.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 positionY 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示侦听器在3D笛卡尔空间中的y位置。

trans-unit.source: The positionZ property of the PannerNode interface specifies the Z coordinate of the audio source's position in 3D Cartesian coordinates, corresponding to the depth axis (behind-in front of the listener). The complete vector is defined by the position of the audio source, given as (positionX, positionY, positionZ), and the orientation of the audio source (that is, the direction in which it's facing), given as (orientationX, orientationY, orientationZ).
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 positionZ 属性以3D笛卡尔坐标指定音频源位置的Z坐标，该坐标对应于深度轴（在侦听器的后面）。完整的向量由下式给出为（所述音频源的位置，规定 positionX ， positionY ， positionZ ），和音频源的朝向（即，在哪个方向它的朝向），作为（给出 orientationX ， orientationY ， orientationZ ）。

trans-unit.source: The positionZ read-only property of the AudioListener interface is an AudioParam representing the z position of the listener in 3D cartesian space.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 positionZ 只读属性是一个 AudioParam ,它表示3D笛卡尔空间中侦听器的z位置。

trans-unit.source: The postalCode read-only property of the PaymentAddress interface returns a string containing a code used by a jurisdiction for mail routing, for example, the ZIP Code in the United States or the Postal Index Number (PIN code) in India.
trans-unit.target: PaymentAddress 接口的 postalCode 只读属性返回一个字符串，其中包含一个司法辖区用于邮件路由的代码，例如，美国的邮政编码或印度的邮政索引号（PIN码）。

trans-unit.source: The prepend() method is not scoped into the with statement. See Symbol.unscopables for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 prepend() 方法不作用域到 with 声明。有关更多信息，请参见 Symbol.unscopables 。

trans-unit.source: The preventSilentAccess() method of the CredentialsContainer interface sets a flag that specifies whether automatic log in is allowed for future visits to the current origin, then returns an empty Promise. For example, you might call this, after a user signs out of a website to ensure that he/she isn't automatically signed in on the next site visit. Mediation varies by origin, and is an added check point of browser stored credentials, informing a user of an account login status. This method is typically called after a user signs out of a website, ensuring this user's login information is not automatically passed on the next site visit.
trans-unit.target: CredentialsContainer 接口的 preventSilentAccess() 方法设置一个标志，该标志指定是否允许自动登录以供将来访问当前源时使用，然后返回一个空的 Promise 。例如，在用户退出网站以确保他/她在下次访问网站时不会自动登录之后，您可以调用此方法。中介因来源而异，并且是浏览器存储的凭据的附加检查点，用于通知用户帐户登录状态。通常在用户退出网站后调用此方法，以确保在下次访问网站时不会自动传递该用户的登录信息。

trans-unit.source: The primaryKey read-only property of the IDBCursor interface returns the cursor's current effective key. If the cursor is currently being iterated or has iterated outside its range, this is set to undefined. The cursor's primary key can be any data type.
trans-unit.target: IDBCursor 接口的 primaryKey 只读属性返回游标的当前有效键。如果游标当前正在迭代或已超出其范围，则将其设置为undefined。光标的主键可以是任何数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The productID read only property of the USBDevice interface the manufacturer-defined code that identifies a USB device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 productID 读取的唯一属性 USBDevice 接口的制造商定义的代码标识USB设备。

trans-unit.source: The productName read only property of the USBDevice interface the manufacturer-defined name that identifies a USB device.
trans-unit.target: 的 productName 读取的唯一属性 USBDevice 接口的制造商定义的名称标识的USB设备。

trans-unit.source: The program parameter doesn't correspond to a GLSL program generated by WebGL, or the specified program hasn't been linked successfully.
trans-unit.target: 该 program 参数与WebGL生成的GLSL程序不对应，或者指定的程序尚未成功链接。

trans-unit.source: The program parameter is not a value or object generated by WebGL.
trans-unit.target: 的 program 参数不是采用WebGL生成的值或对象。

trans-unit.source: The prompt() method of the BeforeInstallPromptEvent interface allows a developer to show the install prompt at a time of their own choosing.
trans-unit.target: 该 prompt() 的方法 BeforeInstallPromptEvent 接口允许开发人员在展示他们自己选择的时间安装提示。

trans-unit.source: The protocol property's value is set when the RTCIceCandidate() constructor is used. The value is automatically extracted from the candidate a-line, if it's formatted properly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RTCIceCandidate() 构造函数时，将设置 protocol 属性的值。如果格式正确，则将从 candidate a行中自动提取该值。

trans-unit.source: The provider property of the FederatedCredential interface returns a USVString containing a credential's federated identity provider.
trans-unit.target: FederatedCredential 接口的 provider 属性返回一个 USVString ,其中包含证书的联合身份提供者。

trans-unit.source: The pushManager property of the ServiceWorkerRegistration interface returns a reference to the PushManager interface for managing push subscriptions; this includes support for subscribing, getting an active subscription, and accessing push permission status.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerRegistration 接口的 pushManager 属性返回对 PushManager 接口的引用，以管理推送订阅。这包括对订阅的支持，获得有效的订阅以及访问推送许可状态。

trans-unit.source: The put() method of the Cache interface allows key/value pairs to be added to the current Cache object.
trans-unit.target: Cache 接口的 put() 方法允许将键/值对添加到当前 Cache 对象中。

trans-unit.source: The put() method of the IDBObjectStore interface updates a given record in a database, or inserts a new record if the given item does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: IDBObjectStore 接口的 put() 方法更新数据库中的给定记录，或者如果给定项不存在则插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The qpSum property of the RTCRtpStreamStats dictionary is a value generated by adding the Quantization Parameter (QP) values for every frame sent or received to date on the video track corresponding to this RTCRtpStreamStats object. In general, the higher this number is, the more heavily compressed the video data is.
trans-unit.target: RTCRtpStreamStats 字典的 qpSum 属性是通过将迄今为止已发送或接收的每个帧的量化参数（QP）值添加到与该 RTCRtpStreamStats 对象相对应的视频轨道上而生成的值。通常，此数字越高，视频数据的压缩程度就越高。

trans-unit.source: The quaternion read-only property of the OrientationSensor interface returns a four element Array whose elements contain the components of the unit quaternion representing the device's orientation.
trans-unit.target: 的 quaternion 只读的属性 OrientationSensor 接口返回一个四个元件 Array ，其元素包含表示设备的方向的单位四元数的部件。

trans-unit.source: The query() method of the LockManager interface returns a Promise that resolves with an object that contains information about held and pending locks.
trans-unit.target: LockManager 接口的 query() 方法返回一个 Promise ，该Promise使用一个对象进行解析，该对象包含有关持有和未决锁的信息。

trans-unit.source: The queryInfo() property of the StorageQuota interface returns a StorageInfo object containting the current data usage and available quota information for the application.
trans-unit.target: StorageQuota 接口的 queryInfo() 属性返回一个 StorageInfo 对象，该对象包含应用程序的当前数据使用情况和可用配额信息。

trans-unit.source: The rate property of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance interface gets and sets the speed at which the utterance will be spoken at.
trans-unit.target: SpeechSynthesisUtterance 接口的 rate 属性获取并设置说出语音的速度。

trans-unit.source: The ratio property of the DynamicsCompressorNode interface Is a k-rateAudioParam representing the amount of change, in dB, needed in the input for a 1 dB change in the output.
trans-unit.target: DynamicsCompressorNode 接口的 ratio 属性是一个k速率的 AudioParam ,代表输入的1 dB变化所需的变化量（dB）。

trans-unit.source: The ratio property's default value is 12 and it can be set between 1 and 20.
trans-unit.target: 该 ratio 属性的默认值是 12 ，它可设置为 1 和 20 。

trans-unit.source: The read() method of the Clipboard interface requests a copy of the clipboard's contents, delivering the data to the returned Promise when the promise is resolved. Unlike readText(), the read() method can return arbitrary data, such as images.
trans-unit.target: Clipboard 接口的 read() 方法请求剪贴板内容的副本，并在解决 Promise 数据传递到返回的Promise中。与 readText() 不同， read() 方法可以返回任意数据，例如图像。

trans-unit.source: The read() method of the ReadableStreamBYOBReader interface returns a promise providing access to the next chunk in the byte stream's internal queue.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamBYOBReader 接口的 read() 方法返回一个诺言，提供对字节流内部队列中下一个块的访问。

trans-unit.source: The read() method of the ReadableStreamDefaultReader interface returns a promise providing access to the next chunk in the stream's internal queue.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamDefaultReader 接口的 read() 方法返回一个promise，提供对流内部队列中下一个块的访问。

trans-unit.source: The readAsBinaryString method is used to start reading the contents of the specified Blob or File. When the read operation is finished, the readyState becomes DONE, and the loadend is triggered. At that time, the result attribute contains the raw binary data from the file.
trans-unit.target: 该 readAsBinaryString 方法用于开始读取指定的内容， Blob 或 File 。读取操作完成后， readyState 变为 DONE ，并且触发 loadend 。那时， result 属性包含文件中的原始二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The readAsDataURL method is used to read the contents of the specified Blob or File. When the read operation is finished, the readyState becomes DONE, and the loadend is triggered. At that time, the result attribute contains the data as a data: URL representing the file's data as a base64 encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 该 readAsDataURL 方法用于读取指定的内容， Blob 或 File 。读取操作完成后， readyState 变为 DONE ，并且触发 loadend 。那时， result 属性包含数据作为数据：URL表示文件数据为base64编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The readAsText method is used to read the contents of the specified Blob or File. When the read operation is complete, the readyState is changed to DONE, the loadend event is triggered, and the result attribute contains the contents of the file as a text string.
trans-unit.target: 该 readAsText 方法用于读取指定的内容， Blob 或 File 。读取操作完成后， readyState 更改为 DONE ，触发 loadend 事件，并且 result 属性包含文件内容作为文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The readable side of the transformStream.
trans-unit.target: 的 readable 的的侧 transformStream 。

trans-unit.source: The ready getter property of the WritableStreamDefaultWriter interface returns a Promise that resolves when the desired size of the stream's internal queue transitions from non-positive to positive, signaling that it is no longer applying backpressure.
trans-unit.target: WritableStreamDefaultWriter 接口的 ready getter属性返回一个 Promise ，当流的内部队列的所需大小从非正向正转变为正时发出信号，表明不再使用背压。

trans-unit.source: The ready read-only property of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface provides a way of delaying code execution until a service worker is active. It returns a Promise that will never reject, and which waits indefinitely until the ServiceWorkerRegistration associated with the current page has an active worker. Once that condition is met, it resolves with the ServiceWorkerRegistration.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerContainer 接口的 ready 只读属性提供了一种延迟代码执行的方式，直到服务工作者处于活动状态为止。它返回一个永不拒绝的 Promise ，并无限期地等待直到与当前页面关联的 ServiceWorkerRegistration 具有 active 工作程序。满足该条件后，将使用 ServiceWorkerRegistration 进行解决。

trans-unit.source: The ready readonly property of the FontFaceSet interface returns a Promise that resolves to the given FontFaceSet.
trans-unit.target: FontFaceSet 接口的 ready readonly属性返回一个 Promise ，它解析为给定的 FontFaceSet 。

trans-unit.source: The readyState read-only property of the IDBRequest interface returns the state of the request.
trans-unit.target: IDBRequest 接口的 readyState 只读属性返回请求的状态。

trans-unit.source: The reason read-only property of the VRDisplayEvent interface returns a human-readable reason why the event was fired.
trans-unit.target: VRDisplayEvent 接口的 reason 只读属性返回触发事件的易于理解的原因。

trans-unit.source: The reason string is too long or contains unpaired surrogates.
trans-unit.target: 该 reason 字符串太长或包含不成替代品。

trans-unit.source: The recommendedFieldOfView read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface describes the recommended field of view for the current eye — ideally based on user calibration.
trans-unit.target: 该 recommendedFieldOfView 只读的财产 VREyeParameters 接口描述的观看推荐领域当前的眼睛-最好是基于用户校准。

trans-unit.source: The rect() method creates a rectangular path whose starting point is at (x, y) and whose size is specified by width and height.
trans-unit.target: 的 rect() 方法创建一个矩形路径，其出发点是在 (x, y) ，并且其大小是由指定的 width 和 height 。

trans-unit.source: The redEyeReduction read-only property of the PhotoCapabilities interface returns a RedEyeReduction object indicating the red-eye reduction capability of the source.
trans-unit.target: PhotoCapabilities 接口的 redEyeReduction 只读属性返回一个 RedEyeReduction 对象，该对象指示源的防红眼能力。

trans-unit.source: The redirect() method of the Response interface returns a Response resulting in a redirect to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: Response 接口的 redirect() 方法返回一个 Response ,导致重定向到指定的URL。

trans-unit.source: The redirect read-only property of the Request interface contains the mode for how redirects are handled.
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 redirect 只读属性包含处理重定向的方式。

trans-unit.source: The redirectCount property returns a timestamp representing the number of redirects since the last non-redirect navigation under the current browsing context.
trans-unit.target: 该 redirectCount 属性返回一个 timestamp 表示从当前浏览上下文中的最后一个非重定向导航的重定向数量。

trans-unit.source: The redirectEnd read-only property returns a timestamp immediately after receiving the last byte of the response of the last redirect.
trans-unit.target: 该 redirectEnd 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 收到的最后一个重定向响应的最后一个字节之后。

trans-unit.source: The redirectStart read-only property returns a timestamp representing the start time of the fetch which that initiates the redirect.
trans-unit.target: 该 redirectStart 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 表示取的发起重定向的开始时间。

trans-unit.source: The reduction read-only property of the DynamicsCompressorNode interface is a float representing the amount of gain reduction currently applied by the compressor to the signal.
trans-unit.target: DynamicsCompressorNode 接口的 reduction 只读属性是一个float，表示压缩器当前施加到信号的增益减少量。

trans-unit.source: The refDistance property of the PannerNode interface is a double value representing the reference distance for reducing volume as the audio source moves further from the listener – i.e. the distance at which the volume reduction starts taking effect. This value is used by all distance models.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 refDistance 属性是一个双精度值，表示当音频源远离听众移动时减小音量的参考距离，即，音量减小开始生效的距离。所有距离模型均使用此值。

trans-unit.source: The refDistance property's default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 该 refDistance 属性的默认值是 1 。

trans-unit.source: The refDistance, maxDistance, or rolloffFactor properties have been given a value that is outside the accepted range.
trans-unit.target: 的 refDistance ， maxDistance ，或 rolloffFactor 属性被赋予一个值，超出了可接受的范围。

trans-unit.source: The referrer read-only property of the Request interface is set by the user agent to be the referrer of the Request. (e.g., client, no-referrer, or a URL.)
trans-unit.target: 用户界面将 Request 接口的 referrer 只读属性设置为Request的Referrer。（例如 client ， no-referrer 或URL。）

trans-unit.source: The referrerPolicy read-only property of the Request interface returns the referrer policy, which governs what referrer information, sent in the Referer header, should be included with the request.
trans-unit.target: Request 接口的 referrerPolicy 只读属性返回Referrer策略，该策略控制在 Referer 标头中发送的哪些Referrer信息应包括在请求中。

trans-unit.source: The refresh() function handles applying the rotation and position by using an SVG transform.
trans-unit.target: 在 refresh() 函数处理通过使用施加旋转和位置SVG变换。

trans-unit.source: The regionCode read-only attribute of the PaymentAddress interface returns a one-, two-, or three-alphanumeric code (DOMString) representing the region of the address (e.g., "CA" for California, or "11" for Lisbon, Portugal).
trans-unit.target: PaymentAddress 接口的 regionCode 只读属性返回一个，一个或两个或三个字母数字代码（ DOMString ），代表地址的区域（例如，对于加利福尼亚州，是“ CA”；对于葡萄牙里斯本，则是“ 11”） 。

trans-unit.source: The register() method of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface creates or updates a ServiceWorkerRegistration for the given scriptURL.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerContainer 接口的 register() 方法为给定 scriptURL 创建或更新 ServiceWorkerRegistration 。

trans-unit.source: The registration read-only property of the ServiceWorkerGlobalScope interface returns a reference to the ServiceWorkerRegistration object, which represents the service worker's registration.
trans-unit.target: ServiceWorkerGlobalScope 接口的 registration 只读属性返回对 ServiceWorkerRegistration 对象的引用，该对象代表服务工作者的注册。

trans-unit.source: The relatedAddress field's value is set when the RTCIceCandidate() constructor is used. You can't specify the value of relatedAddress in the options object, but the address is automatically extracted from the candidate a-line, if it's formatted properly, being taken from its rel-address field.
trans-unit.target: 使用 relatedAddress RTCIceCandidate() 构造函数时，将设置relatedAddress字段的值。您不能在options对象中指定 relatedAddress 的值，但如果地址格式正确，则会自动从 candidate a线中提取地址，并从其 rel-address 字段中获取。

trans-unit.source: The relatedPort field's value is set when the RTCIceCandidate() constructor is used. You can't specify the value of relatedPort in the options object, but the address is automatically extracted from the candidate a-line, if it's formatted properly, being taken from its rel-port field.
trans-unit.target: 使用 relatedPort RTCIceCandidate() 构造函数时，将设置relatedPort字段的值。您不能在options对象中指定 relatedPort 的值，但是如果地址格式正确，则会从其 rel-port 字段中自动从 candidate a线中提取地址。

trans-unit.source: The release property of the DynamicsCompressorNode interface Is a k-rateAudioParam representing the amount of time, in seconds, required to increase the gain by 10 dB. It defines how quick the signal is adapted when its volume is reduced.
trans-unit.target: DynamicsCompressorNode 接口的 release 属性是k速率 AudioParam ,表示将增益提高10 dB所需的时间（以秒为单位）。它定义了减小音量后信号适应的速度。

trans-unit.source: The release property's default value is 0.25 and it can be set between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 的 release 属性的默认值是 0.25 ，它可设置为 0 和 1 。

trans-unit.source: The releaseInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when a cliamed interface is released from exclusive access.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 releaseInterface() 方法返回一个 promise ，该承诺将在从互斥访问释放重名接口时解决。

trans-unit.source: The releaseLock() method of the ReadableStreamBYOBReader interface releases the reader's lock on the stream. After the lock is released, the reader is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamBYOBReader 接口的 releaseLock() 方法释放读取器对流的锁定。释放锁定后，阅读器将不再处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The releaseLock() method of the ReadableStreamDefaultReader interface releases the reader's lock on the stream.
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamDefaultReader 接口的 releaseLock() 方法释放读取器对流的锁定。

trans-unit.source: The releaseLock() method of the WritableStreamDefaultWriter interface releases the writer's lock on the corresponding stream. After the lock is released, the writer is no longer active. If the associated stream is errored when the lock is released, the writer will appear errored in the same way from now on; otherwise, the writer will appear closed.
trans-unit.target: WritableStreamDefaultWriter 接口的 releaseLock() 方法释放作家在相应流上的锁定。释放锁定后，编写器不再处于活动状态。如果解除锁定时关联的流出错，则从现在开始，编写器将以相同的方式出现错误；否则，编写器将显示为关闭。

trans-unit.source: The remove() method is not scoped into the with statement. See Symbol.unscopables for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 remove() 方法不作用域到 with 声明。有关更多信息，请参见 Symbol.unscopables 。

trans-unit.source: The removeItem() method of the Storage interface, when passed a key name, will remove that key from the storage if it exists. If there is no item associated with the given key, this method will do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了密钥名称，则 Storage 接口的 removeItem() 方法将从该密钥中删除该密钥（如果存在）。如果没有与给定键关联的项目，则此方法将不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The removetrack event does not get fired when JavaScript code explicitly removes tracks from the stream (by calling removeTrack()).
trans-unit.target: 该 removetrack 事件并没有被解雇时，JavaScript代码明确地从数据流中删除曲目（通过调用 removeTrack() ）。

trans-unit.source: The renderHeight read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface describes the recommended render target height of each eye viewport, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: VREyeParameters 接口的 renderHeight 只读属性描述每个眼睛视口的建议渲染目标高度，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The renderWidth read-only property of the VREyeParameters interface describes the recommended render target width of each eye viewport, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: VREyeParameters 接口的 renderWidth 只读属性描述每个眼睛视口的建议渲染目标宽度，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The renotify read-only property of the Notification interface specifies whether the user should be notified after a new notification replaces an old one, as specified in the renotify option of the Notification() constructor.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 renotify 只读属性指定，在新的通知替换旧的通知之后，是否应通知用户，如 Notification() 构造函数的 renotify 选项中所指定。

trans-unit.source: The replaceWith() method is not scoped into the with statement. See Symbol.unscopables for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 replaceWith() 方法不作用域到 with 声明。有关更多信息，请参见 Symbol.unscopables 。

trans-unit.source: The reportGamepads() function looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 该 reportGamepads() 函数如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The request() method of the LockManager interface requests a Lock object with parameters specifying its name and characteristics. The requested Lock is passed to a callback, while the function itself returns a Promise that resolves with undefined.
trans-unit.target: LockManager 接口的 request() 方法使用指定其名称和特征的参数来请求 Lock 对象。所请求的 Lock 传递给回调，而函数本身返回一个 Promise ，它使用 undefined 解析。

trans-unit.source: The request read-only property of the FetchEvent interface returns the Request that triggered the event handler.
trans-unit.target: FetchEvent 接口的 request 只读属性返回触发事件处理程序的 Request 。

trans-unit.source: The requestDevice() method of the USB interface returns a Promise that resolves with an instance of USBDevice if the specified device is found. Calling this function triggers the user agent's pairing flow.
trans-unit.target: USB 接口的 requestDevice() 方法返回一个 Promise ，如果找到了指定的设备，则使用 USBDevice 的实例进行解析。调用此函数将触发用户代理的配对流程。

trans-unit.source: The requestId read-only property of the PaymentResponse interface rreturns the free-form identifier supplied by the PaymentResponse() constructor by details.id.
trans-unit.target: PaymentResponse 接口的 requestId 只读属性r通过 PaymentResponse() 由PaymentResponse（）构造函数提供的自由格式标识符。

trans-unit.source: The requestPermission() method of the Notification interface requests permission from the user for the current origin to display notifications.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 requestPermission() 方法向用户请求当前来源的权限，以显示通知。

trans-unit.source: The requestPersistentQuota() property of the StorageQuota interface requests persistent storage for the requesting application and returns a Promise to an instance of StorageInfo. There is no guarantee that the requested space will be granted by the user agent.
trans-unit.target: StorageQuota 接口的 requestPersistentQuota() 属性为请求的应用程序请求持久存储，并将 Promise 返回到 StorageInfo 的实例。不保证所请求的空间将由用户代理授予。

trans-unit.source: The requestStart read-only property returns a timestamp of the time immediately before the browser starts requesting the resource from the server, cache, or local resource. If the transport connection fails and the browser retires the request, the value returned will be the start of the retry request.
trans-unit.target: 该 requestStart 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 的时间浏览器开始从服务器请求，缓存或本地资源的资源之前立即。如果传输连接失败并且浏览器退出请求，则返回的值将是重试请求的开始。

trans-unit.source: The requireInteraction read-only property of the Notification interface returns a Boolean indicating that a notification should remain active until the user clicks or dismisses it, rather than closing automatically.
trans-unit.target: Notification 接口的 requireInteraction 只读属性返回一个 Boolean 指示在用户单击或关闭通知之前通知应保持活动状态，而不是自动关闭。

trans-unit.source: The reserve() property of the BudgetService interface returns a Promise that resolves to a boolean indicating whether the requested budget operation can be reserved.
trans-unit.target: BudgetService 接口的 reserve() 属性返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为一个布尔值，指示是否可以保留所请求的预算操作。

trans-unit.source: The reset() method of the USBDevice interface eturns a promise that resolves when the device is reset and all app operations canceled and their promises rejected.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 reset() 方法返回一个 promise ，当设备复位且所有应用程序操作被取消且诺言被拒绝时，诺言就会解析。

trans-unit.source: The resetSensor() method of the VRDevice interface
trans-unit.target: VRDevice 接口的 resetSensor() 方法

trans-unit.source: The respondWith() method of FetchEvent prevents the browser's default fetch handling, and allows you to provide a promise for a Response yourself.
trans-unit.target: 该 respondWith() 的方法 FetchEvent 阻止浏览器的默认提取处理，并允许您提供了一个承诺 Response 自己。

trans-unit.source: The respondWith property of the PaymentRequestEvent interface prevents the default event handling and allows you to provide a Promise for a PaymentResponse object yourself.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequestEvent 接口的 respondWith 属性防止默认事件处理，并允许您自己为 PaymentResponse 对象提供一个 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: The respondWithNewView() method of the ReadableStreamBYOBRequest interface xxx
trans-unit.target: ReadableStreamBYOBRequest 接口xxx 的 respondWithNewView() 方法

trans-unit.source: The response is a Blob object containing the binary data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 response 是一个 Blob 包含二进制数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The response is a Blob object containing the binary data.
trans-unit.target: 所述 response 是一个 Blob 包含二进制数据对象。

trans-unit.source: The response is a JavaScript object created by parsing the contents of received data as JSON.
trans-unit.target: 所述 response 是通过解析接收到的数据作为内容创建的JavaScript对象JSON。

trans-unit.source: The response is an HTMLDocument or XMLXMLDocument, as appropriate based on the MIME type of the received data. See HTML in XMLHttpRequest to learn more about using XHR to fetch HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 根据所接收数据的MIME类型， response 为HTML Document 或XML XMLDocument 。请参阅XMLHttpRequest中的HTML，以了解有关使用XHR来获取HTML内容的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The response is an HTMLDocument or XMLXMLDocument, as appropriate based on the MIME type of the received data. See HTML in XMLHttpRequest to learn more about using XHR to fetch HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 根据所接收数据的MIME类型， response 为HTML Document 或XML XMLDocument 。请参阅XMLHttpRequest中的HTML，以了解有关使用XHR来获取HTML内容的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The response is part of a streaming download; this response type is only allowed for download requests, and is only supported by Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 该 response 是流下载的一部分; 仅下载请求允许使用此响应类型，并且Internet Explorer仅支持此响应类型。

trans-unit.source: The response is text in a DOMString object.
trans-unit.target: 该 response 是在文本 DOMString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The response is text in a DOMString object.
trans-unit.target: 该 response 是在文本 DOMString 对象。

trans-unit.source: The responseEnd read-only property returns a timestamp immediately after the browser receives the last byte of the resource or immediately before the transport connection is closed, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 该 responseEnd 只读属性返回一个 timestamp ，浏览器会立即收到传输连接被关闭前的资源或最后一个字节，以先到者为准之后。

trans-unit.source: The responseStart read-only property returns a timestamp immediately after the browser receives the first byte of the response from the server, cache, or local resource.
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器从服务器，缓存或本地资源接收到响应的第一个字节后， responseStart 只读属性立即返回 timestamp 。

trans-unit.source: The result contains the raw binary data from the file in a string.
trans-unit.target: 该 result 包含在一个字符串的文件的原始的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The result is a JavaScript ArrayBuffer containing binary data.
trans-unit.target: 的 result 是一个JavaScript ArrayBuffer 包含的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The result is a string with a data: URL representing the file's data.
trans-unit.target: 该 result 是一个字符串 data: URL表示文件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The result is text in a string.
trans-unit.target: 该 result 是在一个字符串文本。

trans-unit.source: The result of a request generated from a call to add() is the key of the value that was added. So in this case, it should equal the ssn property of the object that was added, since the object store uses the ssn property for the key path. Note that the add() function requires that no object already be in the database with the same key. If you're trying to modify an existing entry, or you don't care if one exists already, you can use the put() function, as shown below in the Updating an entry in the database section.
trans-unit.target: 的 result 从一个呼叫产生的请求的 add() 是所添加的值的键。所以在这种情况下，它应该等于 ssn 加入该对象的属性，因为对象存储使用 ssn 的关键路径属性。请注意， add() 函数要求没有任何对象具有相同的键在数据库中。如果您要修改现有条目，或者不关心是否已有条目，则可以使用 put() 函数，如下面的“ 更新数据库中的条目”部分所示。

trans-unit.source: The result read-only property of the IDBRequest interface returns the result of the request. If the request failed and the result is not available, an InvalidStateError exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: IDBRequest 接口的 result 只读属性返回请求的结果。如果请求失败并且结果不可用，则抛出 InvalidStateError 异常。

trans-unit.source: The resume() method of the BaseAudioContext Interface resumes the progression of time in an audio context that has previously been suspended.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 resume() 方法在以前已暂停的音频上下文中恢复时间的进展。

trans-unit.source: The resume() method of the OfflineAudioContext interface resumes the progression of time in an audio context that has been suspended. The promise resolves immediately because the OfflineAudioContext does not require the audio hardware. If the context is not currently suspended or the rendering has not started, the promise is rejected with InvalidStateError.
trans-unit.target: OfflineAudioContext 接口的 resume() 方法在已暂停的音频上下文中恢复时间的进度。由于 OfflineAudioContext 不需要音频硬件，因此承诺会立即解决。如果上下文当前未暂停或渲染尚未开始，则使用 InvalidStateError 拒绝承诺。

trans-unit.source: The resume event is thrown as a result of the MediaRecorder.resume() method being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 由于调用 MediaRecorder.resume() 方法而引发了 resume 事件。

trans-unit.source: The returnValue property of the HTMLDialogElement interface gets or sets the return value for the <dialog>, usually to indicate which button the user pressed to close it.
trans-unit.target: HTMLDialogElement 接口的 returnValue 属性获取或设置 <dialog> 的返回值，通常指示用户按下哪个按钮将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: The rgba() function is similar to the rgb() function but it has one extra parameter. The last parameter sets the transparency value of this particular color. The valid range is again between 0.0 (fully transparent) and 1.0 (fully opaque).
trans-unit.target: 该 rgba() 函数类似于 rgb() 函数，但它有一个额外的参数。最后一个参数设置此特定颜色的透明度值。有效范围还是介于0.0（完全透明）和1.0（完全不透明）之间。

trans-unit.source: The rightDegrees read-only property of the VRFieldOfView interface returns the number of degrees to the right that the field of view extends in.
trans-unit.target: VRFieldOfView 接口的 rightDegrees 只读属性返回视野延伸到的右边的度数。

trans-unit.source: The rightProjectionMatrix read-only property of the VRFrameData interface returns a Float32Array representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the projection to be used for the right eye’s rendering.
trans-unit.target: VRFrameData 接口的 rightProjectionMatrix 只读属性返回一个 Float32Array ,它表示一个4x4矩阵，该矩阵描述了用于右眼渲染的投影。

trans-unit.source: The rightViewMatrix read-only property of the VRFrameData interface returns a Float32Array representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the view transform to be used for the right eye’s rendering.
trans-unit.target: VRFrameData 接口的 rightViewMatrix 只读属性返回一个 Float32Array ,它表示一个4x4矩阵，该矩阵描述了用于右眼渲染的视图变换。

trans-unit.source: The rolloffFactor property of the PannerNode interface is a double value describing how quickly the volume is reduced as the source moves away from the listener. This value is used by all distance models.The rolloffFactor property's default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 rolloffFactor 属性是一个双精度值，它描述了当源远离侦听器时，音量减小的速度。所有距离模型都使用此值 rolloffFactor 属性的默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: The rotationRates property is a read only object describing the rotation rates of the device around each of its axes:
trans-unit.target: 所述 rotationRates 属性是只读对象描述其各个轴的装置的旋转速率：

trans-unit.source: The sampleRate property of the AudioBuffer interface returns a float representing the sample rate, in samples per second, of the PCM data stored in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: AudioBuffer 接口的 sampleRate 属性返回一个浮点数，该浮点数表示存储在缓冲区中的PCM数据的采样率（以每秒采样数为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The sampleRate property of the BaseAudioContext interface returns a floating point number representing the sample rate, in samples per second, used by all nodes in this audio context. This limitation means that sample-rate converters are not supported.
trans-unit.target: BaseAudioContext 接口的 sampleRate 属性返回一个浮点数，该浮点数表示此音频上下文中的所有节点使用的采样率（以每秒采样数为单位）。此限制意味着不支持采样率转换器。

trans-unit.source: The scale read-only property of the VisualViewport interface returns the pinch-zoom scaling factor applied to the visual viewport.
trans-unit.target: VisualViewport 接口的 scale 只读属性返回应用于视觉视口的捏缩放比例因子。

trans-unit.source: The scope parameter is optional, and can be used to specify the subset of your content that you want the service worker to control. In this case, we have specified '/sw-test/', which means all content under the app's origin. If you leave it out, it will default to this value anyway, but we specified it here for illustration purposes.
trans-unit.target: 该 scope 参数是可选的，可用于指定内容的子集所需的服务工人控制。在这种情况下，我们指定了' /sw-test/' ，这意味着该应用程序起源下的所有内容。如果您忽略它，则无论如何它将默认为该值，但出于说明目的，我们在此处指定了该值。

trans-unit.source: The screenX read-only property of the MouseEvent property provides the horizontal coordinate (offset) of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: MouseEvent 属性的 screenX 只读属性以全局（屏幕）坐标提供鼠标指针的水平坐标（偏移）。

trans-unit.source: The screenY read-only property of the MouseEvent interface provides the vertical coordinate (offset) of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.
trans-unit.target: MouseEvent 接口的 screenY 只读属性以全局（屏幕）坐标提供鼠标指针的垂直坐标（偏移）。

trans-unit.source: The scripts property of the Document interface returns a list of the <script> elements in the document. The returned object is an HTMLCollection.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 scripts 属性返回文档中 <script> 元素的列表。返回的对象是 HTMLCollection 。

trans-unit.source: The scroll() method of the Element interface scrolls the element to a particular set of coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Element 接口的 scroll() 方法将元素滚动到一组特定的坐标。

trans-unit.source: The scroll event is raised when the user scrolls the contents of an element. Element.onscroll is equivalent to element.addEventListener("scroll" ... ).
trans-unit.target: 的 scroll 当用户滚动元素的内容事件被引发。 Element.onscroll 等效于 element.addEventListener("scroll" ... ) 。

trans-unit.source: The scrollBy() method of the Element interface scrolls an element by the given amount.
trans-unit.target: Element 接口的 scrollBy() 方法将元素滚动给定的数量。

trans-unit.source: The scrollHeight value is equal to the minimum height the element would require in order to fit all the content in the viewport without using a vertical scrollbar. The height is measured in the same way as clientHeight: it includes the element's padding, but not its border, margin or horizontal scrollbar (if present). It can also include the height of pseudo-elements such as ::before or ::after. If the element's content can fit without a need for vertical scrollbar, its scrollHeight is equal to clientHeight
trans-unit.target: 的 scrollHeight 属性值等于最小高度的元件将需要以适应在视口中的所有内容，而无需使用垂直滚动条。高度的测量方法与 clientHeight 相同：它包括元素的填充，但不包括其边框，边距或水平滚动条（如果存在）。它还可以包括伪元素的高度，例如 ::before 或 ::after 。如果元素的内容不需要垂直滚动条就可以容纳，则其 scrollHeight 等于 clientHeight

trans-unit.source: The scrollWidth value is equal to the minimum width the element would require in order to fit all the content in the viewport without using a horizontal scrollbar. The width is measured in the same way as clientWidth: it includes the element's padding, but not its border, margin or vertical scrollbar (if present). It can also include the width of pseudo-elements such as ::before or ::after. If the element's content can fit without a need for horizontal scrollbar, its scrollWidth is equal to clientWidth
trans-unit.target: 所述 scrollWidth 值等于宽度的元件将需要以适应在视口中的所有内容，而无需使用一个水平滚动条的最小值。宽度的测量方法与 clientWidth 相同：它包括元素的填充，但不包括其边框，边距或垂直滚动​​条（如果存在）。它还可以包括伪元素的宽度，例如 ::before 或 ::after 。如果元素的内容不需要水平滚动条就可以容纳，则其 scrollWidth 等于 clientWidth

trans-unit.source: The scrollingElement read-only property of the Document interface returns a reference to the Element that scrolls the document. In standards mode, this is the root element of the document, document.documentElement.
trans-unit.target: Document 接口的 scrollingElement 只读属性返回对滚动文档的 Element 的引用。在标准模式下，这是文档的根元素 document.documentElement 。

trans-unit.source: The searchParams property of the URL interface returns a URLSearchParams object allowing access to the GET query arguments contained in the URL.
trans-unit.target: URL 接口的 searchParams 属性返回 URLSearchParams 对象，该对象允许访问URL中包含的GET查询参数。

trans-unit.source: The secureConnectionStart read-only property returns a timestamp immediately before the browser starts the handshake process to secure the current connection. If a secure connection is not used, the property returns zero.
trans-unit.target: 该 secureConnectionStart 只读属性返回一个 timestamp 立即启动浏览器的握手过程，以确保当前连接之前。如果未使用安全连接，则该属性返回零。

trans-unit.source: The seekable read-only property of the HTMLMediaElement returns a TimeRanges object that contains the time ranges that the user is able to seek to, if any.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 的 seekable 只读属性返回一个 TimeRanges 对象，该对象包含用户能够搜索的时间范围（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: The selectAlternateInterface() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when the specified alternative endpoint is selected.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 selectAlternateInterface() 方法返回一个 promise ，当选择了指定的替代端点时，该承诺将解决。

trans-unit.source: The selectConfiguration() method of the USBDevice interface returns a promise that resolves when the specified configuration is selected.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 selectConfiguration() 方法返回一个 promise ，当选择了指定的配置时即可解决。

trans-unit.source: The selected property changed its meaning: it now indicates if the option is currently selected and no longer if it was initally selected.
trans-unit.target: 在 selected 属性改变了它的意义：它现在表示，如果当前选择的选项，不再如果它被选中initally。

trans-unit.source: The selected property is a Boolean whose value is true if the track is active. Only a single video track can be active at any given time, so setting this property to true for one track while another track is active will make that other track inactive.
trans-unit.target: 在 selected 属性是一个布尔值，其值是 true ，如果轨道处于活动状态。在任何给定时间，只有一个视频轨道可以处于活动状态，因此，将一个轨道设置为 true ，而将另一轨道激活则将其设为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: The send() method of the PresentationConnection interface tells a controlling browsing context to send binary or text data to a presenting browsing context.
trans-unit.target: PresentationConnection 接口的 send() 方法告诉控制浏览上下文将二进制或文本数据发送到呈现的浏览上下文。

trans-unit.source: The sendMessage() definition looks like so:
trans-unit.target: 该 sendMessage() 的定义看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: The serialNumber read only property of the USBDevice interface is the manufacturer-defined serial number for the specific USB device.
trans-unit.target: USBDevice 接口的 serialNumber 只读属性是特定USB设备的制造商定义的序列号。

trans-unit.source: The serverTiming read-only property returns an array of PerformanceServerTiming entries containing server timing metrics.
trans-unit.target: 所述 serverTiming 只读属性返回的数组 PerformanceServerTiming 含有服务器定时度量的条目。

trans-unit.source: The serviceURI property of the SpeechRecognition interface specifies the location of the speech recognition service used by the current SpeechRecognition to handle the actual recognition. The default is the user agent's default speech service.
trans-unit.target: SpeechRecognition 接口的 serviceURI 属性指定当前 SpeechRecognition 用于处理实际识别的语音识别服务的位置。默认值为用户代理的默认语音服务。

trans-unit.source: The sessionDescription parameter is technically of type RTCSessionDescriptionInit, but because RTCSessionDescription serializes to be indistinguishable from RTCSessionDescriptionInit, you can also pass in an RTCSessionDescription. This lets you simplify code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 从技术 RTCSessionDescriptionInit ， sessionDescription 参数的类型为RTCSessionDescriptionInit，但是由于 RTCSessionDescription 序列化为与 RTCSessionDescriptionInit 不可区分，因此您也可以传入 RTCSessionDescription 。这使您可以简化如下代码：

trans-unit.source: The sessionStorage property allows you to access a session Storage object for the current origin. sessionStorage is similar to Window.localStorage; the only difference is while data stored in localStorage has no expiration set, data stored in sessionStorage gets cleared when the page session ends. A page session lasts for as long as the browser is open and survives over page reloads and restores. Opening a page in a new tab or window will cause a new session to be initiated with the value of the top-level browsing context, which differs from how session cookies work.
trans-unit.target: 该 sessionStorage 的属性，可以访问会话 Storage 对象当前原点。 sessionStorage与 Window.localStorage 类似；唯一的区别是，存储在localStorage中的数据没有设置过期时间，而存储在sessionStorage中的数据在页面会话结束时被清除。只要打开浏览器，页面会话就会持续，并在重新加载和还原页面后继续存在。在新选项卡或窗口中打开页面将导致使用顶级浏览上下文的值来启动新会话，这与会话cookie的工作方式不同。

trans-unit.source: The set() method of the Headers interface sets a new value for an existing header inside a Headers object, or adds the header if it does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: Headers 接口的 set() 方法为 Headers 对象中的现有标题设置新值，或者如果不存在则添加标题。

trans-unit.source: The set() method of the StylePropertyMap interface changes the CSS declaration with the given property.
trans-unit.target: StylePropertyMap 接口的 set() 方法使用给定的属性更改CSS声明。

trans-unit.source: The setActionHandler() property of the MediaSession interface sets an event handler for a media session action.
trans-unit.target: MediaSession 接口的 setActionHandler() 属性为媒体会话操作设置事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The setBaseAndExtent() method of the Selection interface sets the selection to be a range including all or parts of two specified DOM nodes, and any content located between them.
trans-unit.target: Selection 接口的 setBaseAndExtent() 方法将选择范围设置为一个范围，包括两个指定DOM节点的全部或部分，以及位于它们之间的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: The setFieldOfView() method of the HMDVRDevice interface can be used to set the field of view for one eye, or both eyes simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: HMDVRDevice 接口的 setFieldOfView() 方法可用于设置一只眼睛或两只眼睛的视野。

trans-unit.source: The setInterval() function is commonly used to set a delay for functions that are executed again and again, such as animations.
trans-unit.target: 所述 setInterval() 函数通常用于设置该被一次又一次地执行的功能，如动画的延迟。

trans-unit.source: The setInterval() method of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin repeatedly calls a function or executes a code snippet, with a fixed time delay between each call. It returns an intervalID which uniquely identifies the interval, so you can remove it later by calling clearInterval(). This method is offered on the Window and Worker interfaces.
trans-unit.target: WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin 的 setInterval() 方法重复调用函数或执行代码段，每次调用之间有固定的时间延迟。它返回一个唯一标识该间隔的 interval ID ，因此您可以稍后通过调用 clearInterval() 将其删除。在 Window 和 Worker 界面上提供此方法。

trans-unit.source: The setItem() method of the Storage interface, when passed a key name and value, will add that key to the storage, or update that key's value if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: Storage 接口的 setItem() 方法在传递键名称和值时，会将该键添加到存储中，或者更新该键的值（如果已存在）。

trans-unit.source: The setLineDash() method of the Canvas 2D API's CanvasRenderingContext2D interface sets the line dash pattern used when stroking lines. It uses an array of values that specify alternating lengths of lines and gaps which describe the pattern.
trans-unit.target: Canvas 2D API的 CanvasRenderingContext2D 接口的 setLineDash() 方法设置笔划线条时使用的虚线样式。它使用一组值来指定描述图案的线条和间隙的交替长度。

trans-unit.source: The setLineDash method and the lineDashOffset property specify the dash pattern for lines. The setLineDash method accepts a list of numbers that specifies distances to alternately draw a line and a gap and the lineDashOffset property sets an offset where to start the pattern.
trans-unit.target: 该 setLineDash 方法和 lineDashOffset 属性指定线的虚线图案。该 setLineDash 方法接受数字，它指定距离交替画一条线和一个间隙和列表 lineDashOffset 属性集的偏移从哪里开始该图案。

trans-unit.source: The setLiveSeekableRange() method of the MediaSource interface sets the range that the user can seek to in the media element.
trans-unit.target: MediaSource 接口的 setLiveSeekableRange() 方法设置用户可以在media元素中寻找的范围。

trans-unit.source: The setMediaKeys() property of the HTMLMediaElement interface returns a Promise that resolves to the passed MediaKeys, which are those used to decrypt media during playback.
trans-unit.target: HTMLMediaElement 接口的 setMediaKeys() 属性返回一个 Promise ，该Promise解析为传递的 MediaKeys ，即在播放过程中用于解密媒体的MediaKey。

trans-unit.source: The setOrientation() and setPosition() methods have been replaced by setting their property value equivilents. For example setPosition(x, y, z) can be achieved by setting positionX.value, positionY.value, and positionZ.value respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该 setOrientation() 和 setPosition() 方法已被替换设置其属性值equivilents。例如 setPosition(x, y, z) 可以通过分别设置 positionX.value ， positionY.value 和 positionZ.value 来实现。

trans-unit.source: The setOrientation() method of the AudioListener interface defines the orientation of the listener.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 setOrientation() 方法定义侦听器的方向。

trans-unit.source: The setOrientation() method of the PannerNode Interface defines the direction the audio source is playing in.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 setOrientation() 方法定义音频源播放的方向。

trans-unit.source: The setParameters() method of the RTCRtpSender interface applies changes the configuration of the RTCRtpSender.track property. RTCRtpSender.track is an instance of MediaStreamTrack.
trans-unit.target: RTCRtpSender 接口的 setParameters() 方法将应用更改 RTCRtpSender.track 属性的配置。 RTCRtpSender.track 是 MediaStreamTrack 的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The setPeriodicWave() method of the OscillatorNode interface is used to point to a PeriodicWave defining a periodic waveform that can be used to shape the oscillator's output, when type is custom.
trans-unit.target: OscillatorNode 接口的 setPeriodicWave() 方法用于指向 PeriodicWave ,它定义了一个周期性波形，当 type 为 custom 时，该波形可用于调整振荡器的输出。

trans-unit.source: The setPosition() method of the AudioListener Interface defines the position of the listener.
trans-unit.target: AudioListener 接口的 setPosition() 方法定义侦听器的位置。

trans-unit.source: The setPosition() method of the PannerNode Interface defines the position of the audio source relative to the listener (represented by an AudioListener object stored in the AudioContext.listener attribute.) The three parameters x, y and z are unitless and describe the source's position in 3D space using the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 setPosition() 方法定义音频源相对于侦听器的位置（由存储在 AudioContext.listener 属性中的 AudioListener 对象表示。）三个参数 x ， y 和 z 是无单位的，它们描述了源的位置。在3D空间中使用右手笛卡尔坐标系。

trans-unit.source: The setPosition() method's default value of the position is (0,0,0).
trans-unit.target: 所述 setPosition() 方法的位置的缺省值是 (0, 0, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: The setResourceTimingBufferSize() method sets the browser's resource timing buffer size to the specified number of "resource" performance entry type objects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 setResourceTimingBufferSize() 方法设置了浏览器的资源的定时缓冲器大小“指定数目的 resource ” performance entry type 的对象。

trans-unit.source: The setTargetAtTime() method of the AudioParam interface schedules the start of a gradual change to the AudioParam value. This is useful for decay or release portions of ADSR envelopes.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 setTargetAtTime() 方法可安排对 AudioParam 值进行逐步更改的开始。这对于ADSR包络的衰减或释放部分很有用。

trans-unit.source: The setTimeout() method of the WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin (and successor to window.setTimeout) sets a timer which executes a function or specified piece of code once after the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope mixin 的 setTimeout() 方法（和window.setTimeout的后继方法）设置一个计时器，该计时器在计时器到期后执行一次功能或指定的代码段。

trans-unit.source: The setValueAtTime() method of the AudioParam interface schedules an instant change to the AudioParam value at a precise time, as measured against AudioContext.currentTime. The new value is given in the value parameter.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 setValueAtTime() 方法计划在一个精确的时间对 AudioParam 值进行即时更改，该时间相对于 AudioContext.currentTime 进行了测量。新值在value参数中给出。

trans-unit.source: The setValueCurveAtTime() method of the AudioParam interface schedules the parameter's value to change following a curve defined by a list of values. The curve is a linear interpolation between the sequence of values defined in an array of floating-point values, which are scaled to fit into the given interval starting at startTime and a specific duration.
trans-unit.target: AudioParam 接口的 setValueCurveAtTime() 方法调度参数的值，使其沿着由值列表定义的曲线变化。曲线是在浮点值数组中定义的值序列之间的线性插值，这些值按比例缩放以适合于从 startTime 开始的给定间隔和特定持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The setVelocity() method of the PannerNode Interface defines the velocity vector of the audio source — how fast it is moving and in what direction.
trans-unit.target: PannerNode 接口的 setVelocity() 方法定义了音频源的速度矢量-它的移动速度和方向。

trans-unit.source: The setup() function is responsible for building the keyboard and preparing the app to play music.
trans-unit.target: 该 setup() 函数负责建立键盘和准备的应用程序来播放音乐。

trans-unit.source: The shadowBlur property indicates the size of the blurring effect; this value doesn't correspond to a number of pixels and is not affected by the current transformation matrix. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 所述 shadowBlur 属性指示的模糊效应的大小; 该值不对应于多个像素，并且不受当前变换矩阵的影响。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The shadowColor property is a standard CSS color value indicating the color of the shadow effect; by default, it is fully-transparent black.
trans-unit.target: 的 shadowColor 属性是指示的阴影效果的颜色的标准CSS颜色值; 默认情况下，它是完全透明的黑色。

trans-unit.source: The shippingAddress read-only property of the PaymentRequest interface returns the shipping address provided by the user. It is null by default.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequest 接口的 shippingAddress 只读属性返回用户提供的送货地址。默认情况下为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The shippingAddress read-only property of the PaymentRequest interface returns a PaymentAddress object containing the shipping address provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequest 接口的 shippingAddress 只读属性返回一个 PaymentAddress 对象，该对象包含用户提供的送货地址。

trans-unit.source: The shippingOption read-only attribute of the PaymentRequest interface returns either the id of a selected shipping option, null (if no shipping option was set to be selected) or a shipping option selected by the user. It is initially null by when no "selected" shipping options are provided.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequest 接口的 shippingOption 只读属性返回所选送货选项的ID，null（如果未设置要选择的送货选项）或用户选择的送货选项。最初，如果没有提供“选定的”运输选项，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: The shippingOption read-only property of the PaymentRequest interface returns the ID attribute of the shipping option selected by the user. This option is only present when the requestShipping option is set to true in the PaymentOptions object passed to the PaymentRequest constructor.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequest 接口的 shippingOption 只读属性返回用户选择的送货选项的ID属性。仅当传递给 PaymentRequest 构造函数的 PaymentOptions 对象中的 requestShipping 选项设置为 true 时，此选项才存在。

trans-unit.source: The shippingType read-only property of the PaymentRequest interface returns one of "shipping", "delivery", "pickup", or null if one was not provided by the constructor.
trans-unit.target: PaymentRequest 接口的 shippingType 只读属性返回 "shipping" ， "delivery" ， "pickup" ，如果构造函数未提供则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: The shippingaddresschange event doesn't receive the PaymentRequest object directly, so we fetch it from the target property of the event. If the request's shippingAddress has a value for country which isn't in the array validCountries, we generate the error.
trans-unit.target: 该 shippingaddresschange 事件不会收到 PaymentRequest 直接对象，所以我们从获取它 target 事件的性质。如果请求的 shippingAddress 的 country 值不在有效 validCountries 数组中，则会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: The shippingaddresschange event is triggered by a user-agent controlled interaction. If the address stored by the user agent changes at any time during a payment process, the event is triggered. To make sure an updated address is included when sending payment information to the server, you should add event listeners for a PaymentRequest object after instantiation, but before the call to show().
trans-unit.target: 所述 shippingaddresschange 事件是由用户代理控制的相互作用触发。如果用户代理存储的地址在付款过程中随时更改，则触发该事件。为了确保在向服务器发送付款信息时包括更新的地址，您应该在实例化之后但在调用 show() 之前为 PaymentRequest 对象添加事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The shippingoptionchange event is triggered by a user-agent controlled interaction. If the option stored by the user agent changes at any time during a payment process, the event is triggered. To make sure an updated option is included when sending payment information to the server, you should add event listeners for a PaymentRequest object after instantiation, but before the call to show().
trans-unit.target: 所述 shippingoptionchange 事件是由用户代理控制的相互作用触发。如果用户代理存储的选项在付款过程中随时更改，则触发该事件。为了确保在向服务器发送付款信息时包括更新的选项，您应该在实例化之后但在调用 show() 之前为 PaymentRequest 对象添加事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The show() method of the HTMLDialogElement interface displays the dialog modelessly, i.e. still allowing interaction with content outside of the dialog.
trans-unit.target: HTMLDialogElement 接口的 show() 方法以无模式显示对话框，即仍然允许与对话框外部的内容进行交互。

trans-unit.source: The showModal() method of the HTMLDialogElement interface displays the dialog as a modal, over the top of any other dialogs that might be present.
